loans.name: Amie

texts.en: Amie is married and works hard at her business, a general store in the Philippines, to support her family. She is requesting a loan for PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy more items to sell to her customers, including snack foods and canned goods. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to provide for the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy food items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has earned a living for the past 36 years by running a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 29,000 through NWTF to buy items such as shampoo and groceries to sell to her customers. In addition to running her store, Cecilia earns money on the side from fishing and pig fattening. She has sustained her business through her own hard work and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business and continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy items such as shampoo and groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is 44 years old, married, and has two children.  Jenelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 18 years.  She earns additional income from raising livestock. 

Jenelyn is requesting her tenth loan from NWTF for 21,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase more items to sell in her store. Jenelyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del comité Santa Lucia decidieron unirse a este provechoso proyecto que ofrece la  Fundación Paraguaya. Todas ellas cuentan con sus emprendimientos pero también hacen actividades juntas con las cuales fomentan su compañerismo y se ayudan las unas a las otras.
Ilsa es una de las miembros, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que siempre se esfuerza por ayudar a los suyos y que no les falte nada. Ella comenta que se dedica a la venta de prendas de segunda, cuya venta va en ascenso, ya que las personas últimamente prefieren estas prendas por ser baratas. El sueño de Ilsa es poder tener una gran tienda y así tener mayor lugar para ofrecer sus productos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra prendas de segunda mano, como ser remeras, camisas, jeans y demás, con lo cual podrá surtir su negocio y de esa forma seguir ofreciendo variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The women of the Santa Lucia communal bank decided to join this beneficial project that the Fundación Paraguaya offers.  They all have their enterprises, but they also do activities together, which foster their camaraderie, and they help each other. 

Isla is one of the members.  She is a hard-working and tenacious person.  She always puts forth great effort to help her loved ones so that they will not want for anything.  She says that she sells second hand clothes.  Her sales are increasing because lately people prefer this clothing because it is inexpensive.  Isla’s dream is to be able to have a big store.  This way she would have a bigger place to sell her products.

She is requesting the loan to buy second hand clothes like t-shirts, shirts, jeans, and others.  With this merchandise she will be able to stock her business.  This way she will continue offering a variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothes like t-shirts, shirts, jeans, and other garments.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: For the last four years, Rebecca has worked hard to support her family by running a copra (or dried coconut kernel) business in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy coconuts. Rebecca earns additional income from raising livestock, and would like to save enough money to improve her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy coconuts for her business.

loans.name: Amy

texts.en: Amy is 52 years old, married and the mother of two children. For the last 12 years, she has worked hard to support her family by running a general store in the Philippines. Amy has borrowed and repaid 21 previous loans from NWTF, and supplements the income she earns from her store by raising hogs. She has requested a loan for PHP 10,000 to buy more items to sell to her customers and to buy feed for her pigs. Her goal is to raise enough money to build a restaurant at a public market.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell and feed for her herd of pigs.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: La Sra. Martina tiene 45 años no es casada pero convive con su pareja con el cual tienen dos hijos que son de las edades de 17 y 12 años, ella se dedica a la  elaboración y venta de  chicharrón de pollo en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en una de las calles más concurridas de la ciudad de Cochabamba este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Martina  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material de construcción para la construcción de un cuarto en su casa,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo la falta de capital ya que  los ingresos de ella y su pareja no alcanza para la compra de material de construcción, la Sra. Martina enfrenta retos en su negocio que son el no tener un puesto fijo establecido en el mercado de la ciudad  donde pueda vender el chicharrón de pollo, por este motivo vende en la calle y va a utilizar los beneficios del crédito en la compra de ladrillo y yeso para seguir construyendo su casita.
texts.en:
Martina as 45 years old and not married but lives with her partner, but has two sons ages 17 and 12.  She dedicates herself to making and selling fried chicken at her food stall, which can be found on one of the busiest streets in the city of Cochabamba.  This loan is her first sequence within the institution.  Martina will use the loan to buy construction materials for building a room in her house.  Her reason for requesting the funds is a lack of capital, given that her and her partner's income is not enough to buy the needed materials.

Martina meets challenges in her business, such as not having a fixed business location at the city’s market from which to sell her fried chicken.  For this reason, she sells her food on the street, and will use the benefits of the loan to buy bricks and plaster to continue building her little house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for building a room in her house.

loans.name: Juquilitas De Yutacu Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Juquilitas de Yutacu, está conformado por catorce mujeres trabajadoras e indígenas que hablan el idioma mixteco. Las integrantes de este grupo son originarias de Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca que en mixteco se dice Ñuu Oko. Pinotepa se deriva de los vocablos Pinolli=casa desmoronada, polvo y Tepetl= cerro, pan= hacia, por lo que literalmente significa ”hacia el cerro desmoronado”.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora Francisca Rocio de 23 años de edad, mejor conocida como Rocio quien es una señora amable y humilde. Ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos  y  perfumes de la marca Avon desde hace tres años. Rocio sale a las colonias de su comunidad a ofrecer su mercancía de casa en casa siempre sonriendo y atendiendo bien a las personas. Inició su negocio gracias a una vecina y amiga que le recomendó vender este tipo de productos por ser un negocio rentable y ofrece la oportunidad de administrar su tiempo. Hasta el momento, está feliz con los resultados obtenidos. Ella menciona que todos los días trabaja con mucha dedicación; una de las cosas que no le gustan es cuando tiene que cobrar. Rocio esté felizmente casada con el señor Juan  Carlos con quien tiene dos hijos: Saúl Daniel y Pedro Pablo, sus mayores tesoros. Uno de sus sueños es vender calzado por recomendación de sus propias clientas ya que le dicen que es lo que más compran. Rocío pidió el préstamo para la compra de más cosméticos y perfumes. Le da las gracias a Vision Fund por ayudarla y sobre todo por preocuparse por su negocio.

Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Regina Eugenia - se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Josefa Francisca - se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Ricarda - se dedica a la venta de aguas frescas.
Erika Cecilia - se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Susana - se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Esther - se dedica a la venta de dulces.
Lucia - se dedica a la venta de refacciones.
Minerva Adelfa - se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Catalina - se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Julieta Dominga - se dedica a la venta de dulces.
Prisciliana – se dedica a la venta de postres.
Maria Isabel - se dedica a la venta de quesos.
Lucia del Carmen - se dedica a la venta de carnes.

Todas ellas le dan las gracias a la organización por ayudarlas a mejorar sus vidas y que puedan ayudan darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called "Juquilitas de Yutacu", which consists of 14 hardworking and indigenous women who speak the Mixtec language. The members are originally from Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca, which is "Ñuu Oko" in Mixtec. Pinotepa is derived from the words "pinoli" meaning "crumbled house, dust"; "teptl" meaning "hill", and "pan" meaning "toward". Therefore, the literal meaning is "to turn the hill into dust."

One of the members of the group is Sra. Francisca Rocio. She is 23 years old and is better known as "Rocio". She is a friendly and humble woman. Rocio has been selling cosmetics and perfumes from the Avon line for three years. She goes to the subdivisions within her community to offer her merchandise by going house-to-house with a smile and providing good service to everyone. Rocio started this business thanks to a neighbor and friend who recommended that she sell these types of products since this would be a profitable business and provide her with the opportunity to manage her time. To this day, she is pleased with the results she has achieved. Rocio mentions that she works every day with great dedication. One of the things that she does not like is collecting payments.

Rocio is happily married to Sr. Juan Carlos and they have two children, Saúl Daniel y Pedro Pablo, who are their greatest treasures. One of her dreams is to begin selling shoes on the recommendation of one of her customers who said that these products are purchased frequently. Rocio is requesting a loan in order to buy more cosmetics and perfumes. She thanks Vision Fund for helping her and, above all, caring about her business.

The other members of the group are as follows: • Regina Eugenia sells Mexican street food. • Josefa Francisca sells clothing. • Ricarda sells fruit drinks. • Erika Cecilia sells clothing. • Susana sells Mexican street food. • Esther sells candy. • Lucia sells snacks. • Minerva Adelfa sells Mexican street food. • Catalina sells perfumes. • Julieta Domings sells candy. • Prisciliana sells desserts. • Maria Isabel sells cheese. • Lucia del Carmen sells meat.

All of the members are grateful to the FRAC organization for helping them improve their lives and provide a better life for their families.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and perfumes.

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es:
Eugenio forma parte del Banco Comunal “Leonor Mascayano” perteneciente a la ciudad de Talcahuano.
El se dedica a la artesanía, específicamente cuadros. Se desempeña en este negocio desde hace 6 años.
El ofrece su mercadería a su clientela en ferias artesanales.
Comenta que sus insumos los obtiene a través de objetos reciclados, como cartón, paja, terciado, entre otros.
Con el crédito comprará materiales para presentarse en las ferias artesanales.
Una de sus metas es poner un local de artesanía, donde la gente disfrute como se realiza el trabajo manual de la artesanía.
Eugenio vive con su madre, 2 hermanos y 2 sobrinos, sus sueños a nivel personal son poder viajar y tener su propio local.
El está muy contento y agradecido de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que el crédito le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Adamás se siente cómodo con el grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte. Comenta además que las capacitaciones impartidas le han servido para invertir mejor en su negocio.
Talcahuano es una comuna y ciudad-puerto de la región del Biobío, al sur de Chile. Es conocida como uno de los principales puertos del país. Su nombre en mapudungun (lengua mapuche) significa "cielo tronador". Posee un paisaje natural  muy atractivo, debido a la combinación de ríos, mar, planicies fértiles, vegas y los cuerpos montañosos, con una hermosa vegetación. Su economía gira en torno a su puerto, su Base Naval, y un importante barrio industrial con empresas siderúrgicas, refinería de petróleo, petroquímica, cemento, gas, etc.
texts.en:
Eugenio is a member of the Leonor Mascayano Community Bank in the town of Talcahuano. For the last six years he has earned his living making crafts. He sells his work at craft fairs and uses recycled objects such as cardboard, straw, plywood etc. With the loan money he plans to buy other supplies for his crafts. One of Eugenio’s goals is to open a workshop where people can go to relax while he works on his crafts. 

He lives with his mother, two brothers, and two nephews. His personal dream is to be able to travel and open a store of his own.

Eugenio is very happy and grateful to have this opportunity from Fondo Esperanza as the loan will allow him to invest in his business. He feels very comfortable with his Community Bank and notes that the training he has received has enabled him to make better investment decisions.

Talcahuano is a town and port in the Biobío region in the south of Chile. It is one of the most important ports in the country. In the Mapuche language it is called Mapudungun which means ‘sky that thunders’. The countryside around is very attractive with its rivers, ocean, fertile plains, meadows, mountains, and beautiful vegetation. The local economy is based on the port, the naval base, an industrial area with iron and steel factories, a petroleum refinery, and petrochemical, cement, and gas plants etc.

loans.use: to buy materials for crafts

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en: Yolanda is married and has worked hard to support her family by running a fishing business in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 28,000 through NWTF to buy nylon, bamboo and other materials that she needs to continue fishing. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy nylon, bamboo and other materials for a fishing business.

loans.name: Dias Felices Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento DIAS FELICES está compuesto por ocho integrantes, seis mujeres y dos varónes, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Flora ella tiene 62 años y es casada con 3 hijos que son ya algunos mayores e independientes tienen las edades de  33, 25 y 22 años.  Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una tienda de barrio que se encuentran en zona Santa Vera Cruz. Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución y utilizara este préstamo para la compra de mercadería como abarrotes y refrescos para surtir su tienda,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su  capital de trabajo, la Sra. Flora enfrenta retos en su negocio que son competencia ya que en su zona existen varias tiendas de barrio pero ella siempre atiende a su clientela con amabilidad y utilizara los beneficios en seguir surtiendo su tienda, la Sra. se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The “Días Felices” (Happy Days) communal bank has 8 members, six women and two men.  The bank president is Flora, 62.  She’s married and has three children who are all now independent adults; they are 33, 25 and 22 years old.  She sells basic staple items in a neighborhood store located in the Santa Vera Cruz neighborhood.

This loan is her first sequence in the institution and she will use it to buy merchandise like groceries and soft-drinks to stock her store.  Her reason for requesting the loan is to increase her working capital.  The business challenge Flora faces is competition since there are many stores in her neighborhood but she always treats her customers with kindness and will use profits to continue stocking her store.  She is grateful to the institution for the help provided.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Santos Matilde

texts.es:
Doña Santos tiene 54 años de edad, es madre soltera con tres hijos y está viviendo en una  colonia en zona periférica de San Pedro Sula junto a su hija menor.
Ella siempre se ha dedicado a las labores del hogar y también al comercio, tiene más de 15 años de realizar esta actividad de vender mercadería en forma ambulante de casa en casa, en ferias y en su casa atraves de encargos o pedidos. Vende sandalias, zapatos, ropa interior para damas, caballeros y niños y otros productos que le encargan sus clientes. Doña santos está solicitando un préstamo de 5,000.00 Lempiras para mejorar las ventas surtiendo de mercadería como ropa, sandalias y otros encargos que le hacen para obtener más ingresos. Su meta es lograr establecer este negocio en un local fijo y ofrecer a sus clientes variedad de productos. Agradece mucho la oportunidad de financiamiento  a ODEF y a KIVA.
texts.en:
Doña Santos is 54 years old and a single mother with three children. She lives in the subdivision of Zona Periférica in San Pedro Sula with her young daughter. Santos has always been a homemaker, but she is also a merchant. She has more than 15 years of experience in the business of selling merchandise by going house-to-house, visiting fairs, and taking orders and requests from her home. Santos sells sandals, shoes, undergarments (for women, men, and children), and other products that have been ordered by her customers.

Doña Santos is requesting a loan of 5,000 HNL in order to improve her sales. She plans to restock her inventory of merchandise such as clothing, sandals, and other requested items so that she can generate more income. Her goal is to establish her business in a fixed location and offer her customers a variety of products. She is extremely grateful for the financing opportunity from ODEF and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy new clothing, undergarments, sandals, and shoes.

loans.name: Lucia Lourdes

texts.es: La Sra. Lucia  tiene 43 años se dedica a la venta de ropa  desde hace varios años, en la populosa calles de la ciudad de Quillacollo - Cochabamba, es clienta antigua nuestra siempre demostrando responsabilidad en sus pagos,  su  esposo sigue trabajando en el departamento de Oruro, como minero en minas chicas, trabajando a destajo, el  crédito le servirá para surtirse de mas mercadería  de ropa por esta época de invierno, cuenta con vivienda propia, en la zona Norte, la Sra. Lucia es una persona muy y trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución, por este nuevo crédito ya que en el anterior crédito le fue bastante bien.
texts.en: Lucia, 43, has had a business selling clothing for a number of years.  She sells on the crowded streets of the city of Quillacollo, Cochabamba. She is a long-time client who has always been responsible with her payments.  Her husband continues to work as a miner in small mines in the department of Oruro, where he is paid according to his output.  Lucia will use this loan to stock up with more clothing for the winter season.  She has her own home in the northern area of the city.  Lucia is a very hardworking person who is happy and grateful to the institution for this new loan, because things went quite well with her previous loan.

loans.use: to buy clothing for the winter season

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
Virgen de Fátima se llama el comité, y actualmente  se encuentra en el decimo tercer ciclo del programa de comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Gracias al trabajo en conjunto de ellas es que ya están en este ciclo y su meta es poder seguir juntas y asi ayudar a sus familias.
La Sra. Gloria es una de las miembros, ella tiene 40 años de edad, está casada con el Sr   Gustavo y  juntos tienen 3 hijos. Ella  es Peluquera y comenta que tiene muy buena clientela gracias al buen servicio que le da a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de crema para cabellos, tintes,  Shampoo, enjuagues  y demás insumos para poder seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes. Agradece por la ayuda que ella y sus amigas están recibiendo, ya que les será muy útil.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Virgen de Fátima," and is currently in its 13th loan cycle in the Enterprising Women program.  They have gotten this far by working together, and their goal is to stay together and in this way help their families.

Gloria is one of the members.  She is 40 years old, and is married to Gustavo.  Together, they have 3 children.  Gloria is a hairdresser, and she says that she has a very good customer base thanks to the good service that she gives to her customers.

Gloria is requesting a loan to buy hair cream, hair coloring agents, shampoo, rinses, and other supplies so that she can keep providing good service to her customers.  She appreciates the help that she and her friends are receiving, because it will be very helpful to them.

loans.use: to buy hair cream, hair coloring agents, shampoo, rinses, and other beauty supplies

loans.name: El Mirador Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama El mirador, está conformado por diez mujeres trabajadoras humildes e indígenas que se dedican a diferentes actividades económicas.
Son originarias de  Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca una de sus artesanías son las mascaras de madera, machetes, bordados de lana y blusas de chaquira.Cuenta con diferentes playas, la principal la playa de corralero.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora Maria de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad se caracteriza por sus deseos de mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
Doña Mari como mejor la conocen sus compañeras de grupo se dedica a la venta de ropa americana desde hace un año y a la venta de mercancía de abarrotes desde hace catorce años, lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es atender bien a las personas y sobre todo regalarles una linda sonrisa.
Doña Mari dice que le gusta mucho vivir la vida y siempre estar de ánimos  y trabajar mucho para engrandecer sus  dos pequeños negocios.
Esta feliz porque sus negocios le dejan buenas ganancias y así puede  engrandecerlos cada día mas conforme va vendido va comprando su mercancía.
Una de las cosas que no le gusta de su tienda de abarrotes es que ocasiones sale a vender a las colonias vecinas y se queda cerrado y pierde clientes.
Uno de sus sueños es tener un local donde pueda exhibir su mercancía y atender con más comodidad a  las personas.
Pidió el crédito para la compra  de mas ropa americana para la venta como es: faldas, blusas, vestidos, shores pantalones y camisas.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por apoyar a las personas trabajadoras con deseos de superación.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son: 
Hilaria- se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Maria Anita- se dedica a la venta de pan.
Rosalia- se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Efigenia- se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Eneida- se dedica a la venta de tacos.
Rosalia- se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Teresa- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Guillermina Elena- se dedica a la venta de catálogos.
Ingrid Arizlendi- se dedica a la venta de perfumes.

Le dan las gracias a Vision Fund por ayudar a la gente de pueblos indígenas con deseos de superación.
texts.en:
This group is called “El Mirador,” and is made up of ten humble indigenous working women, dedicated to different businesses.

They are originally from Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca and some of their art forms are wooden masks, machetes, wool knitting, and beaded blouses.  There are a number of beaches there, the main one being the beach of Corralero.

Maria is one of the group’s members.  She is 54 years old and is known for wanting to improve her and her family’s lives. 

Ms. Mari, as she is known by her fellow group members, has been selling American clothing for a year and groceries for 14 months.  What she enjoys most about her business is providing good customer service and above all giving them a nice smile.

Ms. Mari says that she likes living life very much and always being happy and working very much to grow her two small businesses.

She is happy because her businesses provide good earnings and in this way she can grow them, each day buying and selling her merchandise.

One of the things she doesn’t like about her grocery store is that sometimes she goes out to sell in the street and the store remains closed and she loses customers.

One of her dreams is to have a location where she can show her merchandise and serve people more comfortably.

She requested this loan to buy more American clothing, such as skirts, blouses, dresses, Shores pants, and shirts.

She is grateful to the foundation for supporting hardworking people with a desire to succeed.

 The other members are:
 Hilaria – sells Mexican snacks
 Maria Anita – sells bread
 Rosalia – sells Mexican snacks
 Efigenia– sells Mexican snacks
 Eneida – sells tacos
 Rosalia – sells perfumes
 Teresa – sells clothing
 Guillermina Elena – catalog salses
 Ingrid Arizlendi – sells perfumes
 
They are thankful to the Vision Fund for helping indigenous people with a desire to succeed.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
Marisol tiene 20 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene dos hijos a su cargo. Su casa se ubica en el caserío La Coruña Sector El Frutal  en el distrito de Tambogrande. La casa donde vive Marisol es casa propia y ella con su esposo se apoyan mutuamente en las actividades que realizan. 

La actividad que desarrolla Marisol es la crianza y venta de animales como ganado ovino, porcino y aves de corral, los cuales cuando se encuentran en buen grado de desarrollo los comercializa a los comerciantes que llegan a la zona. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 2 años, tiempo en el cual por medio de su amable atención ha conseguido clientela, quienes la prefieren por su trato y por la calidad de los productos que ofrece.  Con los ingresos que percibe Marisol cubre sus gastos y los de su familia.

Marisol desea comprar alimento balanceado para animales como polvillo y maíz, para sus animales.  Es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Marisol is 20, and she lives with a partner and has 2 children in her care.  Her house is located in the El Frutal neighborhood of the rural La Coruña settlement in Tambogrande district.  Marisol lives in her own house, and she and her husband support each other in their economic activities.

Marisol has a business raising and selling animals such as: sheep, pigs and poultry.  When they get to a good state of development she sells them to the traders who come to her area.  She has been doing this type of work for 2 years now, and over this time she has gained a customer base due to her  friendly service.  Her customers choose her business because of her service and the quality of products that she offers.  With the income she earns, Marisol covers expenses for herself and her family.

Marisol wants to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed, including feed made from rice and corn, for her animals.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed, including feed made from rice and corn, for her animals

loans.name: Ariel

texts.es: El Sr. Ariel tiene 22 años y es soltero no tiene  hijos por el momento, se dedica al servicio de internet, su café internet se encuentra ubicado en la zona María Auxiliadora, le va muy bien con esta actividad ya que su negocio se encuentra en un lugar estratégico de la localidad, este préstamo es el primero que  tiene dentro de la institución, el Sr. Ariel vive en la localidad de Sacaba donde escasea el agua la mayor parte del tiempo se compra agua de las cisternas que ofrecen agua por cada zona a un precio módico, por este motivo el solicito este préstamo para la construcción de un tanque de agua para poder tener reserva de agua ya que una de las principales acciones para la construcción de un Tanque de agua es  para almacenar y distribuir el agua, construcción de cañerías que lleva el agua hasta las distintas dependencia como el baño, ducha y cocina  y esto es de mucha utilidad ya que las cisternas van una vez a la semana y muchas veces su familia se queda sin agua y este liquido elemento es imprescindible en cada hogar y con la construcción de este tanque de agua Ariel mejorara de gran manera su calidad de vida, por este motivo se siente agradecido por esta oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Ariel is twenty-two years old, single, and has no children right now. He provides Internet service. His Internet cafe is located in the María Auxiliadora neigborhood. His business is going well, especially because it is located in a strategic site in the neighborhood. This loan is the first that he has had with Emprender. Ariel lives in the Sacaba neighborhood, where water is scarce. Most of the time, he purchases water from tankers that offer water in each neighborhood at a reasonable price. He is requesting this loan so he can build a water tank to be able to have reserves. One of his motivations to build a water tank is to be able to store and distribute water. He also plans to set up pipes to provide water to rooms such as the bathroom, the shower, and the kitchen. This is important because the water tankers only come once a week, and often his family is without water, which is a necessary element in every home. With the construction of a water tank, Ariel will improve his quality of life, and for this reason he is grateful for the opportunity Emprender is offering him.

loans.use: to build a water tank.

loans.name: Bordados Mazahuas Group

texts.es: El grupo "Bordados Mazahuas" está integrado por tres mujeres todas muy trabajadoras y responsables y un hombre. Todos ellos viven en una comunidad llamada San Pablo Tlachichilpa una comunidad donde las personas se dedican a la agricultura. Además, la región es una zona mazahua. El nombre del grupo lo eligió una persona que finalmente decidió salir de la asociación, esta persona se dedicaba a la elaboración de bordados, de allí el nombre (por los bordados que elaboraba la señora Vicenta y porque pertenecen a una zona mazahua). Doña Soledad nos cuenta que tiene 59 años ya es una mujer viuda ya que su esposo desafortunadamente hace poco murió. Ella se dedica la cría y venta de animales como pollos y borregos, en la actividad lleva ya 31 años y la inició porque quería ayudar a su esposo a solventar los gastos del hogar como educación, alimentos, zapatos, etc. La dificultad más grande que presenta Doña Soledad es la falta de alimento para comprar zacate y maíz, ya que los precios de estos productos están muy caros debido a la sequia y la falta de lluvias para obtener una buena cosecha de dichos productos. Doña Soledad comenta que una vez tuvo que sacar sus ahorros del banco para poder comprarles alimento a sus animales, aun así esto no la desanima en nada ya que su meta es comprar un becerro para tener un ahorro en casa. Aunque le va muy bien con las ventas, desea tener un becerro. Explica también, que las veces que ha estado dentro de un crédito le ha ayudado mucho, pues puede comprar zacate, maíz y alimento, pero también cuando vende, sus ganancias las utiliza para comprar comida, calzado y ropa para ella y para una hija que aún depende de ella. Acerca de los demás integrantes, ellos invertirán en sus respectivas actividades: Olivia y Juliana comprarán pollos y Don Mario, el único hombre del grupo, comprará borregos.
texts.en:
The group "Bordados Mazahuas" consists of three hardworking and responsible women and one man. All of them live in the community of San Pablo Tlachichilpa where the residents engage in agriculture. In addition, this region is a Mazahua area. The name was chosen by a person who finally decided to leave the group. This person produced embroideries, therefore the name was created (for the "bordados" [embroideries] produced by Sra. Vicenta and because she is from a Mazahua area).

Doña Soledad says that she is 59 years old. Unfortunately, she is already a widow since her husband died a short time ago. She raises and sells animals, such as chickens and sheep. Doña Soledad has been in this business for 31 years and began working because she wanted to help her husband cover the household expenses such as education, food, shoes, and other needs. Her greatest difficulty is the lack of feed, such as fodder and corn, since these products are very expensive due to drought and the lack of rain required to achieve a good crop harvest. Doña Soledad says that one time she had to withdraw her savings from the bank in order to buy feed for her animals. However, this did not discourage her at all since her goal is to buy a calf that she can keep at her house. Even though her sales have done very well, she still wants a calf. She also explains that a loan has been a great help to her on several occasions when buying fodder, corn, and feed. When she sells, her profits are used to buy food, shoes, and clothing for herself and her daughter who is still dependent on her.

Regarding the other members, they will invest in their respective business activities: • Olivia and Juliana will buy chickens. • Don Mario, the only man in the group, will buy sheep.

loans.use: to buy chickens and sheep.

loans.name: Tojiddin

texts.ru: Точиддин женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Он сам содержит свою семью, а жена также помогает в содержании семьи. Она работает в ЗАГС-е, а Точиддин занимается  купле- продажей канцелярских принадлежностей. Данный бизнес является прибыльным, особенно во время учебы. Данный бизнес помогает жителям данного района совершенствовать их образования. Точиддин запрашивает займ для покупки канцелярских принадлежностей с целю пополнения и расширения бизнеса. Точиддин надеется на вашу помощь и заранее хочет выразить свою благодарность.
texts.en: Tojiddin is married and raising three children. Both he and his wife provide for the family - she works in a registry office, while he sells stationery. Tojiddin's business makes a good profit, particularly during the school year, when it helps the local populace advance their education. Tojiddin is requesting a loan to purchase stationery in order to restock and expand his business. He is hoping for your help and would like to thank you in advance.

loans.use: to purchase stationery

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel is married and has three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Isabel is 46 years old and has three children who are in school.

Isabel has a fishing business in the Philippines. Isabel has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy bamboo, nylon, and a new engine for her fishing boat.

Isabel has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Isabel would like to save money to expand her business and to continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: To buy bamboo, nylon, and a new engine for her fishing boat

loans.name: Ilhomiddin

texts.ru: Илхомиддин более 12 лет занимается торговлей на рынке. Он в основном занимается продажей занавесок, штор и других видов материалов. Ему 40 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Он берет кредит для покупки скатертей и необходимых тканей.
texts.en: Ilhomiddin has been a merchant at a market for over 12 years. Mainly, he sells curtains, drapes, and other types of cloth. Ilhomiddin is 40 years old, married, and has five children. He is taking this loan to buy tablecloths and necessary fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase tablecloths and fabrics

loans.name: Orifkhoni

texts.ru: Орифхон проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он занимается торговлей у себя дома. В основном он занимается торговлей зернобобовых культур оптом. В этой области Орифхон десять лет. Он берет кредит для покупки гороха и кукурузы.
texts.en: Orifkhoni lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 35 years old, married and has three children.  He is involved in sales at home.  He primarily sells legumes wholesale.  Orifkhoni has been in this business for ten years.  He is requesting this loan to buy peas and corn.

loans.use: to purchase peas and corn

loans.name: Rajabali

texts.ru: Рачабали добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин, женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей, один из них несовершеннолетний. На иждивении не имеет ни кого. Жена  занимается домашними делами. Более 10 лет Рачабали занимается купле- продажей риса, фасоля, маш (бобов), гороха и чечевицы. Его торговая точка находится на рынке города и он имеет своих постоянных клиентов. В бизнесе помогает сын. Рачабали хотел бы получить займ для покупки риса, фасоля, гороха, маш и чечевицы с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Рачабали надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Rajabali is a kind and hardworking family man, who is married and raising five children, one of whom is an adolescent.  He is not supporting anyone.  His wife is involved in household work.  Rajabali has been involved in buying and selling rice, beans, mung beans, peas and lentils.  His retail outlet is located at the city market, and he has his regular customers.  His son helps him in the business.  Rajabali wants to obtain this loan to buy rice, beans, peas, mung beans and lentils in order to refill his working capital.  Rajabali relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, peas, corn and lentils in order to refill his working capital

loans.name: Jum'a

texts.ru: Чумъа уже три года как занимается торговлей фруктов и овощей. Ему 63 года. Он разведен. У него двое детей. Он берет кредит для покупки фруктов. Чумъа хочет привезти фрукты из города Худжанда.
texts.en: Jum'a has been involved in selling fruits and vegetables for three years.  He is 63 years, divorced and has two children.  He is requesting this loan to buy fruits.  Jum'a wants to bring fruits from the city of Khujand.

loans.use: to purchase fruits

loans.name: Muhammadkhuja

texts.ru: Мухаммадхуча житель города Исфара. Ему 27 лет. Он холост. Вместе с братом Мухаммадхуча занимается торговлей. Он в основном продает запасные части и занимается ремонтом старых и поломанных машин. Кредит берет для приобретения необходимых запчастей.
texts.en: Muhammadkhuja lives in the city of Isfara. He is 27 years old and single. Together with his brother, Muhammadkhuja sells auto parts and repairs old and broken cars. He is taking this loan to purchase necessary spare parts.

loans.use: to purchase spare auto parts

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa works hard to support her family. Marissa is married and has a clothing sales business in the Philippines.

Marissa requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy more clothes to sell.

Marissa has been in this business for 15 years now, and she also earns some additional income from fishing.

In the future, Marissa would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 30 years old. She is married and has four children.  With all children in school, Analyn works very hard to provide for them.

Analyn runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

Analyn has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as soap, detergent, cooking oil, and other miscellaneous items. 

In the future, Analyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more items to sell

loans.name: Dieudonne Group

texts.fr:
Mme GERMAINE est la responsable du groupe  DIEUDONNE. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 06 ans et le moins âgé a 01an. 01 va à l’école et elle a 02 personnes en charge.

Mme fait la couture depuis 04ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché de gounghin. Ses clients sont les femmes  du quartier.

Elle veut s’acheter 200 fermetures, 20 mètres de satin, 100 mètre de popeline. 

Mme utilise ses économies  pour agrandir son atelier de couture. Elle ambitionne  amélioré les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
GERMAINE is the leader of the DIEUDONNE group. She is married and mother of two children. Her eldest child is six years old and her youngest child is one year old. One of her children attends school, and she has two people living in her care.

GERMAINE has been a seamstress for the past four years. She stocks up at the Gounghin Market. Her clients are women from the neighborhood.

She wants to buy 200 fasteners, 20 meters of satin, and 100 meters of poplin.

GERMAINE uses the money that she saves to enlarge her sewing workshop. She is striving to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy 200 fasteners, 20 meters of satin, and 100 meters of poplin

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia forma parte del Banco Comunal “Leonor Mascayano” perteneciente a la ciudad de Talcahuano.
Ella se dedica al rubro de confección, específicamente en cortinas, buzos, servicios entre otros, desde hace 10 años.
Sonia se desempeña en sus labores desde su casa y trabaja a pedido de su clientela.
Su mercadería la compra en una distribuidora de telas que se especializa en productos para sus confecciones, sus insumos los compra en Santiago ya que sale mucho más conveniente.
Una de las metas de Sonia en su negocio es comprar maquinarias de alto redindimiento, en el cual pueda atender a sus clientes.
Con el crédito comprará materiales para su negocio.
Sonia vive sola, sus sueños son comprar una maquina bordadora.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio.
Además se siente muy cómoda con la compañía de las demás emprendedoras del grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que comparten diferentes actividades, lo cual también le ha servido como un momento de distracción.
Talcahuano es una comuna y ciudad-puerto de la región del Biobío, al sur de Chile. Es conocida como uno de los principales puertos del país. Su nombre en mapudungun (lengua mapuche) significa "cielo tronador". Posee un paisaje natural  muy atractivo, debido a la combinación de ríos, mar, planicies fértiles, vegas y los cuerpos montañosos, con una hermosa vegetación. Su economía gira en torno a su puerto, su Base Naval, y un importante barrio industrial con empresas siderúrgicas, refinería de petróleo, petroquímica, cemento, gas, etc.
texts.en:
Sonia belongs to the communal bank Leonor Mascayano, in the town of Talcahuano.
Sonia has been working in the sewing industry for 10 years, particularly with curtains and sportswear, among other services. Her customers put in orders, and she works at home. She buys her merchandise from a fabric distributor that specializes in the products she needs for her fashions. She buys her input material in Santiago, because it is much more convenient.
One of Sonia's business goals is to purchase high-efficiency machinery in order to serve her customers.
She will use the loan to purchase materials for her business. 
Sonia lives by herself, and her dream is to buy an embroidering machine. 
She is very grateful and happy with the opportunity offered by Fondo Esperanza, because it has allowed her to invest in her business. 
She also feels very comfortable with the other entrepreneurs in the communal bank group, because they share several activities, which have also afforded her some moments of leisure.
Talcahuano is a town and port-city in the Biobío region, in southern Chile. It is known as one of the country's main ports. Its name in mapudungun (mapuche language) means "thundering sky." It has very attractive landscapes, due to the combination of rivers, ocean, fertile plains, meadows, and mountains, with lovely vegetation. Its economy revolvs around the port, the Naval Base, and a significant industrial area comprising iron and steel companies, oil refining, petrochemistry, cement, gas, etc.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her business.

loans.name: Havobibi

texts.ru: Хавобиби жительница города Исфара. Ей 58 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Сама она занимается животноводством. Ее муж работает таксистом. Скотоводством она занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Havobibi is a resident of the city of Isfara.  She is 58 years old, married and has three children.  She is involved in animal husbandry.  Her husband works as a taxi driver.  Havobibi has been involved in animal husbandry for four years.  She is requesting this loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Ahmadbek

texts.ru: Ахмадбек проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 25 лет. Он холост. Ахмадбек занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кроме того он занимается торговлей цемента. Он берет кредит для проведения ремонта и открытия торговой точки. Ахмадбек хочет заняться торговлей мяса.
texts.en: Ahmadbek lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 25 years old, single.  Ahmadbek is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for four years.  Besides this, he is involved in selling cement.  He is requesting this loan to make repairs and open a retail outlet.  Ahmadbek wants to get involved in selling meat.

loans.use: to make repairs and open a retail outlet

loans.name: Safargul

texts.ru: Сафаргул жительница района Восеъ. Ей 47 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Сама Сафаргул занимается скотоводством. Она разводит скот у себя дома. В этой области она пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков в дальнейшем для продажи.
texts.en: Safargul is a resident of the Vose district.  She is 47 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  Safargul is involved in animal husbandry.  She breeds livestock at home.  She has been in this business for five years.  She is requesting this loan to buy bulls for future resale.

loans.use: to buy bulls for future resale

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 61 años, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser cordial y amable.  Está casada con Cayo, quien es cocinero, vive con él y su padre, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad e independientes.

Su actividad es la venta de comida: desayunos, almuerzos y otros refrigerios. Lo hace desde su casa, donde habilito un local y abrió su restaurante. Atiende por las mañanas y tardes, teniendo como sus clientes a los transeúntes de la zona, vecinos y amistades. Inició este negocio hace aproximadamente 5 años, junto a su esposo, quien es el cocinero, y con un préstamo bancario.
Le gusta su trabajo, pues le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual solventar los gastos de su hogar, pues tuvo muchas necesidades económicas por los bajos ingresos cuando su esposo trabajaba de cocinero en un restaurante particular. Pero ahora se siente más aliviada por tener su propio oficio, incluso tiene planes de ampliarlo para atender más cómodamente a sus clientes.

Éste es su préstamo número 6 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera esta oportunidad para concretar sus planes. Se siente muy bien con su banco comunal, pues lo considera ser un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de víveres e ingredientes para la preparación de comidas. También realizará algunas mejoras en su local, como el arreglo de los pisos y paredes, además de la adquisición de más sillas y mesas.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 61, is a hardworking and industrious woman. In addition, she is cordial and friendly. Rosa is married to Cayo, who works as a cook, and lives with him and her father. Her children are already grown and independent.

Her business activity involves selling food including breakfasts, lunches, and snacks. She performs her work from home, where she remodeled a space and opened her restaurant. Rosa is open for service in the mornings and afternoons. Her customers include travelers who pass through the area, neighbors, and friends. She started this business approximately five years ago with her husband, who is the cook, and with the use of a bank loan. Rosa enjoys her work because it enables her to earn an income for covering the household expenses. She had many financial needs and her husband was earning a low salary when he worked as a cook at another restaurant. Now she feels very relieved to have her own business. Rosa also has plans for expansion so that she can accommodate more customers.

This will be her sixth loan with the MFP organization. She expects this opportunity will finalize her plans. Rosa is very pleased with her Communal Bank because she considers her group to be unified and supportive. The amount of 1,500 PEN that she requested will be invested in groceries and ingredients for preparing her dishes. She will also make a few improvements to her establishment, such as repairs to the floors and walls, as well as acquire more chairs and tables.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her dishes and to pay for improvements to her facilities.

loans.name: Karen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Karen; La socia continua trabajando con su negocio de venta de ocas al horno(es un tubérculo parecido a la papa)la socia vende de forma ambulatoria en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco,ella trabaja todos los dias por la mañana , siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mas ocas para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member’s name is Karen and she belongs to the Madres Trabajadores (Working Mothers) Communal Bank, located in the district, department, and province of Cusco.  Karen continues with her business, selling oven-roasted ocas (a tuber similar to a potato).    She is a street vendor and works in one of the markets in the city of Cusco. She works every day in the morning. Through this business, she helps her family get ahead.  Karen is a happy and responsible person with a strong desire to continue working.  She is requesting the loan to purchase more ocas for her business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and promise to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to purchase more ocas for her business.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La socia Valentina se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte y negocio de sevicio de llamadas,la socia el negocio de servicio de llamadas lo realiza en las diferentes calles y el negocio de transporte su esposo maneja el carro que hace servicio de taxi,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar repuestos para su carro como llantas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Valentina, continues to work in a transportation business and a calling service. She operates her calling service in different streets and her husband drives the car that provides taxi service. The member works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. Through these businesses, she is able to support her children. The member is requesting the loan to purchase parts for their car, like tires. 

The member is happy about the loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase parts for her car, like tires.

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Productivo se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 38 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco  hijos de 21, 19,  17, 12 y 7 años de edad, cuatro de ellos aun viven en su casa y estudian en universidad, colegio y escuela. El marido es operador de maquinaria pesada.
 
Nuestra amiga es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a sus hijos con los gastos que generan sus estudios se dedica a la venta de ropa, productos naturales y productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y trabaja cuatro días a la semana de dos a tres horas  diarias ya que es un trabajo que no tiene horario fijo, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 4 años que se dedica a  este tipo de ventas y le va muy bien ya que tiene buena clientela que siempre les compran sus productos.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa, productos naturales, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos entre otras cosas. Lleva 4 ciclos  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer.
 
Su sueño es ver que sus hijos sean muy buenos profesionales ya que por esos lucha dia a dia.
texts.en:
The communal bank Productivo meets every two weeks in the canton of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, which are renowned nationally and internationally. It is home to the famous Panama hat. 

This is where Rosa lives. She is 38 years old and is in a common-law marriage, from which she has five children of ages 21,19, 17,12, and 7. Four of them still live at home and go to university, college, and school. Her husband is a heavy machinery operator.
 
Our friend is a home maker, who in order to obtain her own resources so that she can help her children with school expenses, works selling clothing, natural products, and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and women's accessories). Her selling method is door to door, and she works between two and three hours a day, four days a week. Her work doesn't have a fixed schedule. She leaves her products with her customers on credit, and collects payments once a week. She has been in this line of work for four years, and it is going very well because she has a good base of customers who always purchase her products.

This loan is to purchase clothing, natural products, perfumes, lotions, cosmetics, etc. She has been with the communal bank for four cycles and she enjoys it because the payments are easy to make. 
 
Her dream is to see her children become good professionals, because she fights for them every day.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, natural products, perfumes, lotions, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Kavikhon

texts.ru: Кавихон трудолюбивый и талантливый человек. С детства он любил музыку и пел от души. Затем, когда он вырос он стал петь на разных мероприятиях и стал музыкантам. Имеет дружную семью и троих прекрасных детей. Он работает в музыкальной группе «Бунафша», которая популярна среди жителей данного района. Имеет много заказов и ездит в соседние районы на заказ. Кавихон всегда старается поднимать настроение людей, чтобы подарить им радость. Кавихон хотел бы получить займ для покупки музыкальных инструментов. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Kavikhon is a hardworking and talented person.  He has loved music and sang from his soul since childhood.  Then, when he grew up, he started to sing at various events and became a musician.  He has a friendly family and three beautiful children.  He works in a musical group "Bunafsha," which is popular among the residents of this district.  He has many requests and travels to neighboring districts as requested.  Kavikhon always tries to improve people's moods and give them happiness.  Kavikhon wants to obtain this loan to buy musical instruments.  He relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to purchase of musical instruments

loans.name: Mahmudjoni

texts.ru: Махмадчон проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 22 года. Он женат.  У него пятеро детей. Махмадчон живет вместе с родителями. Его мать преподает в школе. Сам он занимается торговлей на рынке. Он продает панели мобильных телефонов и сим-карт. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Mahmudjoni lives in the city of Kulob.  He is 22 years old, married and has five children.  Mahmudjoni lives together with his parents.  His mother teaches at a school.  Mahmudjoni is involved in sales at a market.  He sells mobile phone covers and SIM cards.  He has been in this business for two years.  He is requesting this loan to increase his goods turnover.

loans.use: to buy SIM cards, spare parts and covers for mobile phones

loans.name: Zaynudin

texts.ru: Зайнудин житель района Восеъ. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его жена занимается торговлей. Сам он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. В этой области он 7 лет. Кредит берет для закупа коровы и бычков.
texts.en: Zaynudin is a resident of the Vose district.  He is 50 years old, married and has six children.  His wife is involved in sales.  Zaynudin earns a living by breeding cattle.  He has been in this business for seven years.  He is requesting this loan to buy a cow and bulls.

loans.use: to buy a cow and bulls

loans.name: Darwing Gustavo

texts.es: Darwing de 21 años de edad solicita  credito para pagar sus estudios universitarios de la carrera Arquitectura en la universidad Centroamericana, su mamá trabaja como administradora de la Universidad URACCAN devengando un salario mensual y su papá trabaja como comerciante ellos seran los responsables, Honestos y muy reconocidos en el municipio, su sueño en la vida es culminar su carrera para ayudar a su preciosa familia y que su familia goza de salud y trabajo.
texts.en:
Darwing is 21 years old.  He is studying for a degree in architecture and is requesting the loan to pay for his tuition at Centroamericana University.  His mother works as an administrator at URACCAN University earning a monthly salary and his father works as a merchant. They are responsible, honest, and very well-known in the town.  His dream in life is to complete his degree so that he can help his beloved family.  He also wants his family to enjoy good health and continued employment
.

loans.use: to pay for university expenses.

loans.name: Santo Thony

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Productivo se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive el Señor Santo, tiene 48 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 22 y 21 años de edad los mismos que estudian en universidad. La esposa es ama de casa y le ayuda en su trabajo.

Nuestro amigo tiene un taller de mecánica automotriz, su especialidad es la parte electrónica y computarizada de los automóviles, nos cuenta que son muchos los clientes que llegan hasta su taller para que les realice sus trabajos ya que no hay muchos técnicos que arreglan este tipo de daños en los vehículos. Su esposa le ayuda en su trabajo al igual que sus hijos cuando ellos pueden, él lleva con su taller por más de 5 años el cual lo tiene en un local alquilado. Allí también el vende ciertos repuestos eléctricos ya que esto le facilita el trabajo y además se gaña algo extra.

Este crédito es para comprar ciertos repuestos eléctricos para vehículos que necesita para surtir su negocio.  Este es el quinto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son muy bajos en relación  a otros bancos. 

Su sueño es tener un local propio para ya no pagar arriendo.
texts.en:
The communal bank Productivo meets every two weeks in the canton of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, which are renowned nationally and internationally. It is home to the famous Panama hat. 

This is where Santo lives. He is 48 years old and is in a common-law marriage, of which he has two children. They are 22 and 21 years old and attend university. His wife is a home maker and helps him with his work. 

Our friend has an auto repair shop specializing in the electrical and computerized parts of the vehicle. He says lots of customers come to his shop for him to work on their vehicles because there aren't very many mechanics who can fix this type of problem. Her wife helps him with his work, as well as their children when they can. He has been in his shop for five years, and rents the premises. There he also sells some electrical spare parts, because it makes his work easier and also allows him to make some extra money. 

This loan is to purchase certain electrical spare parts for vehicles, which he needs in order to stock his business. This is his fifth cycle with the communal bank, and he likes it because the interest rates are very low compared to other banks.  

His dream is to have his own premises so that he no longer has to pay rent.

loans.use: to purchase electrical spare parts for vehicles.

loans.name: Inomjon

texts.ru: Инъомчон трудолюбивый и честный человек. Является заботливым отцом большой дружной семьи. У него прекрасная жена и  шестеро замечательных  детей. Инъомчон опытный шофер с 20 летним стажем . Он предоставляет услуги такси по местному маршруту. Кроме того занимаетcя животноводством и выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Он планирует расширить бизнес скотоводства и с прибыли улучшить благосостояние семьи. Его любящая жена помогает ему в ведении данного бизнеса. Инъомчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки 4 голов скота для откорма и перепродажи. На остальную сумму хочет приобрети корм.
texts.en: Inomjon is a hardworking and honest person.  He is a caring father of a large and friendly family.  He has a beautiful wife and six outstanding children.  Inomjon is a skilled driver with 20 years of experience.  He provides a taxi service along a local route.  Besides this, he is involved in animal husbandry and growing agricultural crops.  He wants to expand the animal husbandry business and improve his family's welfare with the profits.  His loving wife helps him with running this business.  Inomjon wants to obtain this loan to buy four heads of livestock for fattening up and resale.  He wants to use the remaining money to buy livestock feed.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
Angela works hard to support her family. She is single and has a sari-sari (variety) store business in the Philippines.

Angela requested a loan of 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store. She has been in this business for nine years now, and also earns additional income from E-loading (selling prepaid cell phone credits).

In the future, Angela would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.en: Rodrigo is a 63-year-old resident of Silanga, Tangub City. He provides for his four children's needs from the little amount of 8,000 PHP he gains monthly from his own piggery business of two years as an aid to the income gained from his wife, who is a government employee. In 2010 he became a member of GDMPC, and he has applied for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy feeding supplies. He wants to make an expansion to his business one day.

loans.use: To buy feeding supplies

loans.name: Sayhua De Chichubamba Group

texts.es:
La socia perteneces al banco comunal SAYHUA DE CHICHUBAMBA; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Urubamba en la provincia  de Urubamba  departamento de Cusco.

La socia Beatriz; la socia tiene 41 años, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de flores como claveles, gladiolos y rosas, la socia trabaja todos los días desde las 10:00am hasta las 4:00pm, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual mediante este la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de flores para su negocio y de esta manera tener más variedad que ofrecer  a sus clientes.

La socia que sale adjunta en la foto pidio permiso para llegar un poco tarde a la reunion.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de flores, venta de maiz, crianza de animales, tienda de abarrotes, venta de artesanía, crianza de cuyes.

La socia agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Communal Bank "Sayhua de Chichubamba", which is located in the District of Urubamba in Urubamba Province, Department of Cusco.

Beatriz is a member who is 41 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business of buying and selling flowers such as carnations, gladiolas, and roses. Beatriz works every day from 10am to 4pm. She has been in this business for years in order to help her family get ahead. Beatriz is a cheerful and responsible person who has the drive to succeed on behalf of her family. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy flowers for her business so that she can have more variety to offer to her customers.

The member who appears in the smaller photo requested permission to arrive a little late to the meeting. The other members engage in businesses such as selling flowers, selling corn, raising animals, managing a grocery store, selling handicrafts, and raising guinea pigs.

Beatriz is grateful to receive her loan in this manner and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy flowers.

loans.name: Alondra

texts.es:
Alondra forma parte del Banco Comunal “Las Gaviotas” perteneciente  a la ciudad de Talcahuano.
Ella se dedica al rubro en venta de alimento para mascotas, y servicios varios en su almacén, desde hace 2 años, trabaja sola en su casa de lunes a domingo desde las 11ºº hasta las 21ºº horas.
Comenta que sus insumos los compra directamente en bodegas y/o distribuidoras, ya que son lugares en los cuales encuentra su mercadería a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará mercadería para su almacén.
Una de sus metas es agrandar su local y poder agregar maquinas como fotocopiadora, anilladora, plastificadora.
Alondra vive junto a su esposo y 2 hijos de 18 y 11 años, su hijo mayor se encuentra estudiando en la Universidad. Su sueño es tener un buen negocio para generar mayores ingresos, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza. Además se siente cómoda con el grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, lo cual la motiva a seguir participando en la institución.
Talcahuano es una comuna y ciudad-puerto de la región del Biobío, al sur de Chile. Es conocida como uno de los principales puertos del país. Su nombre en mapudungun (lengua mapuche) significa "cielo tronador". Posee un paisaje natural  muy atractivo, debido a la combinación de ríos, mar, planicies fértiles, vegas y los cuerpos montañosos, con una hermosa vegetación. Su economía gira en torno a su puerto, su Base Naval, y un importante barrio industrial con empresas siderúrgicas, refinería de petróleo, petroquímica, cemento, gas, etc.
texts.en:
Alondra is a member of the Community Bank, “Las Gaviotas” (The Gulls), which is located in the city of Talcahuano. Alondra makes a living selling animal and pet food, and also has a general store, which she established about two years ago. She operates her business from her home, and she works Monday through Sunday, from 11:00 am until 9:00 pm. She purchases her merchandise directly from distributors from whom she can hopefully receive lower prices. With the support from this loan, she plans to purchase merchandise for her general store. One of her goals is to grow her business and eventually add office machines, such as a photocopy machine, a hole-punch machine, and a laminating machine. 

Alondra lives with her husband and their two children, ages 18 and 11. Her oldest son is studying in a university, and his dream is to one day have a successful business to generate good income and have a better quality of life. Alondra is grateful for the opportunity given her by Fondo Esperanza, and she is happy to be a member of the Community Bank, as she feels connected to the group and motivated to continue her participation in the institution. 

Talcahuano is a community and city-port in the Biobío region in the south of Chile. It is known for being one of the main ports in the country. Its name in the Mapuche tongue is Mapudungun, which means thundering sky. The region has naturally beautiful geography, since it is made up of a combination of sea coast and inlets, rivers, fertile plains, meadows and mountains, and has beautiful plants and vegetation. Its economy is based on the port, as well as the Navy Base and an important industrial neighborhood that houses steel factories, oil refineries, petro-chemistry facilities, cement plants, gas plants, etc.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her general store.

loans.name: Daniel Enrique

texts.es: El Sr. Daniel tiene 30 años y es soltero él se dedica a  la  tapicería tiene su taller que se encuentran en zona Panamericana,  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Daniel va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material cuero para la fabricación de sus trabajos y así de esta manera incrementar su capital,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra de materiales, el Sr. Daniel  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son competencia y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida, su deseo para su negocio es agrandar su taller.
texts.en: Daniel, 30, is an upholsterer; he has his shop in the Panamericana zone.  This loan is his second sequence in the institution.  Daniel will use this loan to buy leather to do his work and increase his capital.  His reason for requesting the loan is the lack of capital to buy supplies.  The business challenge Daniel faces is competition and he will use profits to improve his quality of life.  His hope for his business is to enlarge his workshop.

loans.use: to buy bolts of leather.

loans.name: Ruth Samary

texts.es: La profesora Ruth Samary de 30 años de edad se desempeña como docente de primaria  desde hace 9 años, esta solicitando  su 7mo crédito para comprar materiales de construcción y asi realizarle reparaciones a su vivienda, cuenta con el apoyo de su compañero de vidaque le ayuda con los gastos del hogar y ademas sabe de trabajos de albañileria y es quien hara las reparaciones de la casa; cabe señalar quetanto Ruth como su esposo son trabajadores conocidos en el municipio como personas responsables y honestas, existen excelentes referencias comerciales y laborales pues Ruth se ha caracterizado`por ser una docente muy responsable, su mayor  sueño en la vida es que su familia goze de salud, que permanezca unida y que permanezca el amor a Dios.
texts.en:
Ruth Samary, 30, has been working as an elementary school teacher for nine years.  She’s asking for her 7th loan to buy building materials and supplies to do some home improvements.  

She has support from her life companion who helps her with household expenses.  In addition, he also has building skills and he will be doing the home improvements.  

It’s worth pointing out that Ruth and her husband are workers in the municipality that are well-known for being responsible, honest people.  They have excellent commercial and work references because Ruth has been characterized as being a very responsible teacher.  

Her greatest wish in life is that her family enjoys good health, that they stay together and the love of God remains.

loans.use: Purchase materials to install a floor and whitewash a room

loans.name: William

texts.es: William es socio del Bancomunal Virgen Del Carmen, tiene 28 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo de 2 años, se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos crudos y los vende por mayor a las tiendas comerciales. Está muy feliz de pertenecer a su Bancomunal porque ha aprendido a ser responsable y puntual. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para la fabricación de ladrillos.
texts.en: William is a member of the “Virgen Del Carmen” communal bank.  He’s 28 years old and has a two-year-old son.  He works making raw bricks that he sells at wholesale to commercial stores.  He’s very happy to belong to his communal bank because he’s learned how to be responsible and punctual.  He will use the loan he’s requesting to buy brick-making supplies.

loans.use: to buy brick-making supplies.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La Sra. Juana  tiene 41  años y es soltera con 5 hijos que son de las edades de 4, 6, 18, 23 y 25 años, ella se dedica a la elaboración y  venta de empanadas y refrescos en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en la zona las Vegas, este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Juana va a usar este préstamo  para la compra una heladera e insumos para la elaboración de sus empanadas y refrescos y así de esta manera incrementar su capital de trabajo, la Sra. Juana enfrenta retos en su negocio que son estar por encima de la competencia y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar los ingresos del negocio, su deseo es tener su propia vivienda para brindar mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en: Juana, 41, is single and has five children who are 4, 6, 18, 23 and 25 years old.  She works making turnovers and refreshments to sell in her stand located in the Las Vegas zone.  This loan is her third sequence in the institution.  Juana will use this loan to buy a freezer and supplies needed to make the empanadas and refreshments thus increasing her working capital.  The business challenge Juana faces is staying ahead of the competition and she will use profits to improve her business’ income.  Her hope is to have a house of her own to provide more comfort for her family.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and ingredients.

loans.name: Hamrobibi

texts.ru: Хамробиби-59 летняя женщина со средним специальным  образованием,преподаватель начальных классов.Она работает в дальнем районе так как там не хватают таких кадров.У ней дома есть помощники, поэтому она может ехать в дальние районы.Муж Абдукаюм занимается откормом скота и получает пенсию.По  совету знакомых она решила получить кредит и использовать на ремонт дома.Ей будут помогать её дети. Услышав о нашей организации,ей понравилось получить круглую сумму и частями погашать долг.Намерена каждый раз работать с Арванд в дальнейшем.
texts.en: Hamrobibi is a 59 year old woman with a secondary vocational education who is an elementary school teacher. She works in a remote district as there is a shortage of such personnel there. She has helpers at home so she can travel to the remote districts. Her husband Abdukaum is fattening cattle and also receives a pension. On an advice from her friends, she has decided to take out a loan to repair her house.  Her children will be helping her. When she heard about our organization, she liked the option of receiving the loan sum upfront and repaying the debt in small portions. She intends to work with Arvand every time going forward.

loans.use: to repair the house

loans.name: Tadjiniso

texts.ru: Таджинисо-узбечка средних лет,замужем и воспитала  троих детей.Все дети уже взрослые и имеют свои отдельные хозяйства.Сейчас  с младшим сыном  и невесткой Таджинисо преподает в районной школе вдали от своего дома и по выходным  приезжает домой, так как каждый день ей не выгодно ехать.Муж Юсуфали инвалид и лечится.В семье зарабатывают сыновья и старшие и они также помогают родителям.Кредит получает на мелкий ремонт своего дома,у неё плохие условия и накопить большую сумму семья не может, а наши условия стали выгодные для Таджиниса.Планирует  работать с нами и благодарит нас за поддержку.
texts.en:
Tadjiniso is a middle-aged Uzbek, she is married and has raised three children. All the children are already grown-ups and have their separate households. 

Currently Tadjiniso, together with her son and daughter in law, is teaching at the regional school far away from home. On the weekends she travels home, as it is not possible for her to go back every day. Her husband Jusufaj is disabled and under treatment. The son and the oldest one of the family earns money and also helps his parents. 

Tadjiniso receives a loan to make small repairs to her house. Her living conditions are poor, and the family can not save a large amount of money, but our conditions are favorable for her. She intends to work with us and thanks us for our support.

loans.use: to repair the house

loans.name: Abdulfayz

texts.ru: Абдулфайз проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин, где он продает хозяйственные товары и продукты питания. Этим видом деятельности Абдулфайз занимается 7 лет. Он берет кредит для покупки хозяйственных товаров и продуктов.
texts.en:
Abdulfayz lives in the Vahdat region. He is 37 years old and married. He has four children. He works in retail. He owns a store, where he sells household goods and food products. Abdulfayz has been engaged in this type of activity for 7 years.

Abdulfayz takes a loan for the purchase of household goods and products.

loans.use: to purchase household goods and products for selling in his store

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en:
Rhoda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines.

Rhoda requested a loan of 13,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy tools and equipment for her tricycle. She has been in this business for three years now, and also earns additional income from selling seashells and gasoline.

In the future, Rhoda would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy tools and equipment for her tricycle transport business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling vegetables and fruit in the Philippines. She is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell for her business. Josephine has been in this business for five years. She earns additional income from raising hogs and farming rice and corn.

Josephine has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Marianie

texts.en: Marianie is 36 years old, married, and has two children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marianie has a business selling used clothing in the Philippines. She requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase an additional bundle of used clothes to sell. Marianie has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Marianie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase a bundle of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
