Analyn is requesting a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell. She aspires to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy charoal to sell

loans.name: Ruth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Señora Ruth del Carmen trabaja en un centro de salud  en el departamento de León desde hace 6 años siendo este  el sustento de su familia.

Cabe mencionar que la señora Ruth del Carmen es madre soltera con dos hijos que a medida del tiempo van creciendo y van sintiendo la necesidad de tener un espacio propio así mismo tiene problemas con su cocina por lo se acerco a ceprodel con la esperanza de seguir contando con el apoyo para la mejora de su cocina y así satisfacer la necesidad de su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Ruth del Carmen works at a health center in the department of León.  For the last six years, this has been her family's sustenance.

It is worth mentioning that Señora Ruth del Carmen is a single mother of two children, who are going to grow over time and will be feeling the need to have a space of their own.  She also has problems with her kitchen, which is why she is coming to Ceprodel with the hope of continuing to have support to improve her kitchen and so meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, tiles, shelving

loans.name: Abel Ángel

texts.es: Abel Ángel vive junto a su compañera de vida María y sus cinco hijos en casa propia, todavía costea el estudio de todos los niños; el  posee una tienda donde vende variedad de productos alimenticios de primera necesidad frijoles,  arroz, huevos, leche, pan, jabón entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el ámbito del comercio de productos de primera necesidad, adicional a esto Abel también se dedica al cuidado del portón de una hacienda, cuando esto sucede su esposa atiende el negocio,  es muy conocido en la zona ya que es muy responsable y honrado; además la clientela lo prefiere porque comercia solo productos de primera calidad a precios realmente accesibles; Abel es un hombre trabajador siempre pensando positivo y buscando las mejores oportunidad para lograr un futuro mejor, ha tenido más demanda últimamente y desea surtir más el negocio pero necesita de capital, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan, golosinas, bebidas, jabones, etc. Abel Ángel tiene excelentes recomendaciones de paga, él sabe que con sus ganancias podrá pagar cada cuota de la deuda en la fecha establecida y al mismo tiempo está seguro que podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Abel Ángel lives with his life-companion María and their five children in their own home.  He is still paying for education for all his children.  He has a tore where he sells a variety of everyday products such as rice, eggs, milk, bread, and soap among other things.  He has had this business for several years, and has much experience in the field of retailing everyday products.  In addition to this, Abel is also working as a security guard at a hacienda; when he is doing this, his wife tends to the business. 

Abel is very well known in his neighborhood, as he is very responsible and honorable.  Also, his customers prefer him because he only retails top quality products at very affordable prices.  Abel is a hard-working man who is always thinking positively and looking for the best opportunities to achieve a better future.  

He has had more demand in his store recently, and wants to stock up his business but he needs capital.  This is why he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to purchase basic grains, instant products, bread, candy, drinks, soap, etc.

Abel Ángel has excellent payment references.  He knows that with his profits he will be able to make each repayment on its scheduled due date, and at the same time he is sure that he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, instant products, bread, candy, drinks, soap.

loans.name: Anorkhon

texts.ru: Анорхон имеет свою аптеку рядом детской больницей. Она очень трудолюбивая, заботливая и честная женщина, на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Муж пенсионер, а Анорхон более 12  лет занимается фармацевтическим бизнесом. Её бизнес зарегистрированный имеет лицензию и сертификат, также сотрудничает с  медицинскими фирмами, которые поставляют ей товар. Также она приобретает товар из соседнего города. В бизнесе помогает её сын. Анорхон хотела бы получить займ для покупки медикаментов с целью расширения ассортимента продуктов.
texts.en: Anorkhon has her own pharmacy near a children's hospital. She is a very hardworking, caring, and honest woman.  She brought up four children. Her husband is retired, and Anorkhon has been working as a pharmacist for more than 12 years. Her business is licensed and registered, and she works with medical supply companies which provide her merchandise. She also gets the goods from a neighboring town. Her son helps her in the business. Anorkhon would like to get a loan to buy medicines in order to expand the range of products she offers.

loans.use: purchase medicine

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Более 16 лет она занимается купле- продажей мужской одежды. Её муж находится в трудовой миграции в Российской Федерации, а Мухаббат сама содержит семью и старается улучшить условия. Её бизнес налажен хорошо и ежедневно она имеет выручку  около 350-400 сомони. Она закупает товар на соседнем рынке. Она старается расширить бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль и дать среднее и высшее образование. Для осуществления своей мечты она обращается к вам и запрашивает займ для закупа товара. Она надеется на вашу поддержку и доброту.
texts.en: Muhabbat is married and the loving mother of three children. For more than 16 years she has worked buying and selling men's clothing. Her husband works in the Russian Federation, and Muhabbat supports the family and tries to improve their living conditions by herself. Her business is solid, and her daily revenue is about 350-400 somoni.  She buys goods at a nearby market. She is trying to expand her business to make a decent profit and to give her children secondary and higher education. To fulfill her dream, she is appealing to you for a loan to purchase goods for resale. She looks forward to your support and kindness.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Horn

texts.en:
Horn is 30 years old and the mother of two school-age children. She and her husband cultivate various types of crops; they primarily grow rice in the Baray District of the Kompong Tom Province. This couple is able to generate an income of 10 USD per day (estimate provided by the credit officer). Horn has been operating this business for many years and has become an experienced farmer who can manage her business successfully.

Horn would like to make an enhancement to her farm business, which is the reason she is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 KHR. The loan will be used to pay for labor costs, buy seeds and chemical fertilizers for the soil. These inputs will greatly assist in ensuring good nutrition for the crops and the production of an abundant harvest in the coming season.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs, buy seeds and chemical fertilizers.

loans.name: Benilda

texts.en:
Benilda is 49 years old and married. She works hard to provide for her family.

Benilda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 30,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more stock of products to sell.

Benilda has borrowed and paid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from rice retail. She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of products to sell.

loans.name: Dos De Mayo Group

texts.es:
La socia perteneces al banco comunal DOS DE MAYO; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Cusco en la provincia  de Cusco y  departamento de Cusco.

La socia Luzgarda; la socia tiene 49 años, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, colonias entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual mediante este la socia saca adelante  a su familia, ella trabaja de forma ambulatoria, a la vez vende productos naturales a sus amistades, familiares y vecinos, la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas  ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería de productos de belleza como colonias.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de crianza de animales menores, alquiler de instrumentos de trekking, venta de cosméticos, venta de crianza de cuyes, tienda de abarrotes.

La socia que sale adjunta en la foto pidio permiso para llegar un poco tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Communal Bank "Dos de Mayo" (May 2nd), which is located in the District and Province of Cusco in the Department of Cusco.

Luzgarda is a member who is 49 years old, married, and has three children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling beauty products such as crèmes, colognes, and other items. Luzgarda has been in this business for years so that she can help her family get ahead. She works as a street vendor in order to sell these natural products to friends, relatives, and neighbors. Luzgarda is a cheerful and responsible person who has the drive to succeed on behalf of her family. She is requesting a loan to buy beauty products, such as colognes.

The other members have businesses that involve raising small animals, renting out mountain hiking equipment, selling cosmetics, raising guinea pigs, and managing a grocery store. The member who appears in the smaller photo requested permission to arrive a little late to the meeting for work reasons.

Luzgarda is grateful for receiving her loan in this manner and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.ru: Рашид опытный фермер, он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Жена швея и занимается пошивом женских национальных платьев. Рашид имеет 1 гектар земли для посева, там выращивает  люцерну и пшеницу. Он также имеет 366 шт. плодовых деревьев, которые каждый год приносят хороший урожай. В основном он занимается откормом и выращиванием скота, имеет 6 голов крупного рогатого скота. Также имеет 30 голов птиц для выращивания. Рашид хотел бы получить займ для покупки 10 голов овец с  ягнятами. Рашид надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Rashid is an experienced farmer, who is married and has four children.  His wife is a seamstress and is involved in sewing women's national dresses.  Rashid has one hectare of land for sowing and grows alfalfa and wheat there.  He also has 366 fruit trees that yield a good harvest every year.  He is primarily involved in fattening up and raising livestock and has six heads of cattle.  He also has 30 heads of birds for raising.  Rashid wants to obtain this loan to buy ten heads of sheep with lambs.  He relies on your support and mercy.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Kimyojon

texts.ru: Кимёджон трудолюбивая женщина, после смерти мужа она стала чувствовать себя беззащитной, и её дети остались сиротами. С большими усилиями  она открыла свой бизнес, чтобы обеспечить своих детей. На воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Более 7 лет она занимается купле - продажей продуктов питания, хозтоваров и строительных материалов. Она арендует место в селе и многие покупатели являются жители данного района. Кимёджон хотела бы получить займ для приобретения продуктов питания и хозтоваров с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Кимёджон надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Kimyojon is a hardworking woman.  After her husband's death, she started to feel defenseless, and her children were left to be orphans.  With a lot of effort, she opened her own business in order to provide for her children.  She is raising five children.  Kimyojon has been involved in buying and selling food products, household goods and construction materials for over seven years.  She leases a space in a village, and many of her customers are the residents of this district.  Kimyojon wants to obtain this loan to buy food products and household goods in order to refill her working capital.  She relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy food products and household goods

loans.name: Kholigul

texts.ru: Холигул проживает в районе Рудаки. Ей 23 года. Она разведена. Холигул живет вместе с родителями. Она более пяти лет занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Кредит берет для приобретения новой модернизированной швейной машинки.
texts.en:
Kholigul lives in the Rudaki region. She is 23 years old. She is divorced. Kholigul lives together with her parents. She has worked with sewing national dresses for more than five years. 

Kholigul takes a loan for the purchase of a new, modern sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a new, modern sewing machine

loans.name: Emom

texts.ru: Эмом проживает в районе Гиссар. Ему 38 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Эмом уже три года как занимается скотоводством. В основном он разводит скот у себя дома. Кредит берет для закупа телят с целью увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Emom lives in the Gissar region. He is 38 years old. He is married and has seven children. Emom has been engaged in livestock breeding for three years already. In general, he breeds cattle at his home. 

Emom takes a loan for the purchase of calves with an aim to increase the number of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Hilda Nohemy

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 24 años de edad, es madre soltera vive con sus 2 hijos de 4 y 1 año de edad en una aldea perteneciente a Choloma, Cortes.
Hilda se gana la vida trabajando en su propio negocio, hace 5 años que comenzó a elaborar y vender donas de harina de trigo (pan), ella vende su producto en forma ambulante, se acerca a las escuelas y colegios y allí a establecido sus clientes. Este negocio es su fuente de ingresos que le permiten salir adelante con sus hijos.
El préstamo que solicita es por 6,000.00 y lo necesita para  comprar la materia prima que son los ingredientes para elaborar las donas como ser, harina de trigo, azúcar, manteca leche etc. espera con este préstamo aumentar las ventas ya que es temporada escolar y a los niños les gusta mucho este tipo de pan.
Su meta es generar los ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos a crecer y crecer en el negocio.
texts.en:
Hilda is 24 years old and a single mother. She lives with her two children (ages 4 and 1) in a neighborhood in Choloma, Cortes.

Hilda earns her living by working in her own business. Five years ago, she began making and selling donuts made of wheat flour. She sells her product as a street vendor near the elementary and high schools where she has established customers. This business is her source of income by which she is able to help her children move forward.

Hilda is requesting a loan of 6,000 HNL because she needs to buy supplies, including ingredients for making donuts such as wheat flour, sugar, butter, milk, and other items. She hopes that this loan will increase her sales since the school year is in session and the children enjoy this snack. Her goals are to generate income to help her children grow and to expand in her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, butter, baking soda, and other ingredients.

loans.name: David Osmin

texts.es: David Osmin vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, él se dedica a la compra y venta de pan dulce, las compras las realiza en unas panaderías cercanas a la localidad donde reside, pan por mayor y en variedad quesadillas, semitas, salpores, tortas, pastelitos entre otros; tiene una gran ventaja pues todo lo comercia de forma ambulante en su vehículo, por lo tanto tiene clientes fijos, tiendas y público en general, la clientela lo prefiere porque vende el pan más exquisito a buen precio y hasta la puerta de su hogar; David es emprendedor, honesto pero sobre todo muy humilde,  piensa que el trabajo es la mejor arma del hombre y él quiere defender su éxito de esta manera; quiere extender su venta a zonas aledañas a la localidad pero necesita aumentar sus compras es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan dulce por mayor; David Osmin tiene la certeza que podrá saldrá el saldo de su deuda pues es muy responsable y tiene muy buenas referencias además con su esfuerzo podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: David Osmin lives with his wife and their two children.  He operates a business buying and selling bread products.  He buys wholesale supplies of bread from bakeries in his neighborhood, along with other kinds of bread products: quesadillas, semitas, salpores, etc.  He has an advantage over competitors because he has a vehicle that he can use to deliver his products.  He has a fixed set of customers--stores and individuals--who buy from him.  They like that he can deliver his delicious bread products right to their doors.  David is an enterprising man, honest and humble about his success.  He says that work is man's best defense and that's how he explains his success.  He is applying for an INTEGRAL loan because he wants to extend his business to nearby neighborhoods.  We are confident that David Osmin can repay the debt because he is very responsible and has good references.  He knows that his efforts will help him to better provide for his family.

loans.use: to stock his food business.

loans.name: Margoth

texts.es: Margoth de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, ella posee un negocio, un pequeño puesto en el mercado municipal de la zona donde vende cosméticos, perfumes para hombre y mujer , cremas entre otros, además adicional a la venta también comercia recargas electrónicas y controles para televisión, el negocio actualmente esta funcionando perfectamente pues tiene lo que el cliente desea, con productos de primera calidad y a precios actos para el bolsillo de la persona; Margoth es una mujer dedicada al trabajo siempre aprovechando las oportunidades que se le presentan, su más grande secreto es la perseverancia y la confianza en sí mismo, le gusta mantenerse adelante de la competencia y en este momento quiere surtir su puesto es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cremas, perfumes, cosméticos, y otros que no ha podido comprar con recursos propios para surtir su negocio. Margoth tiene excelentes referencias de que es buena paga, es responsable y podrá cancelar el financiamiento además de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Margoth is 37 years old, and lives with her life-companion and children.  She has a business, which is a small stand in the municipal market in her neighborhood, where she sells cosmetics, men's and women's perfumes, and creams among other things.  She also sells electronic chargers and TV remote controls.  Her business is currently functioning perfectly, as she has just what her customers want, with top quality products and prices suitable for her customers' pockets.

Margoth is a woman who is dedicated to her work, always taking advantage of the opportunities that present themselves.  Her biggest secret is her perseverance and her confidence in herself. She likes to stay ahead of the competition, and at this moment in time she wants to stock up her market stand.  This is why she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to purchase creams, perfumes, cosmetics, and other things to stock up her business which she hasn't been able to purchase with her own resources.

Margoth has excellent references for repaying, and she will be able to pay back her loan.  In this way she will also be able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to purchase creams, perfumes, cosmetics, and other things to stock up her business which she hasn't been able to purchase with her own resources.

loans.name: Mavjudakhon

texts.ru: Маджудахон замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Муж занимается предпринимательством. Она трудолюбивая и более 4-х лет она занимается купле- продажей женской одежды и обуви. Её торговая точка находится на рынке города. Приобретает товар в соседнем городе, оборотный капитал составляет 5000 долларов США. Маджудахон вежливо общается со своими клиентами, имеет много покупателей и её дневной объем реализации составляет около 600-700 сомони. Мавджудахон хотела бы получить займ для покупки сезонной одежды и обуви с целью расширения ассортимента товаров. Мавджудахон надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Mavjudakhon is married and the loving mother of two children. Her husband works in business. She is hardworking, and for more than four years, she has been buying and selling women's clothing and shoes. Her shop is in the city market. She acquires her goods in a nearby town.  Her working capital is $5,000 US dollars. Mavjudakhon courteously communicates with her customers, and therefore she has many customers.  Her daily sales volume is about 600-700 somoni. Mavjudakhon would like to get a loan to buy seasonal clothing and footwear in order to expand the range of goods she sells. Mavjudakhon is hoping for your kindness and help.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes

loans.name: Abdurozik

texts.ru: Около 9 лет Абдурозик занимается изготовлением лепешек на центральном рынке. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Абдурозик является опытным пекарем. Его бизнес идет хорошо и приносит ему стабильный доход. Сырьё закупает на местном рынке. Абдурозик хотел бы получить займ для покупки угля. Он надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость. Заранее хочет выразить свою благодарность всем кредиторам.
texts.en: Abdurozik has been involved in preparing flatbread at the central market for about nine years.  He is married and raising two adolescent children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Abdurozik is an experienced baker.  His business is going well and yields him a stable income.  He buys his ingredients at a local market.  Abdurozik wants to obtain this loan to buy coal.  He relies on your help and generosity.  He wants to express his gratitude to all creditors in advance.

loans.use: to buy coal

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru: Сухроб добрый и воспитанный человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Жена закончила факультет менеджмента, а Сухроб занимается предоставлением услуги такси  внутри города и соседнего города. Он хорошо обслуживает своих клиентов. Его машина работает на газовом оборудовании что уменьшает расходы ГСМ. Также ездит на заказы. Его ежедневный доход составляет около 160 сомони, а месячный 4800 сомони. Сухроб запрашивает займ для покупки новой современной марки автомобиля. Сухроб надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Suhrob is a good and educated man. He is married and raising two children. His wife graduated in management, and Suhrob offers a taxi service in the city and the neighboring cities. He serves his clients well. 

Suhrob's car runs on gas equipment that reduces the expenses for fuel. He also drives on pre-ordered bookings. His daily income is around 160 somoni, and the monthly income 4800 somoni. 

Suhrob requests a loan for the purchase of a new, modern and branded car. Suhrob hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a new and modern car

loans.name: Mehrona

texts.ru: Мехрона трудолюбивая умная девушка, ей 20 лет. Она живет вместе с родителями. Она отлично закончила школу, и поступила в Таджикский Национальный Университет. Она является студенткой 3-го курса финансово- экономического факультета. Учится хорошо с примерным поведением. Она  умная и воспитанная девушка. Мехрона запрашивает займ для оплаты своего обучения в ВУЗ-е. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Mehrona is a hard-working intelligent young woman of 20. She lives with her parents. Mehrona graduated from high school with top marks and entered Tajik State University, where she is now a 3rd-year student in the Faculty of Finance & Economics. She is a diligent student and does well in her courses. Mehrona is requesting a loan to pay for her continued post-secondary education. She is hoping for your help and compassion.

loans.use: to pay for her education

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин, на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Его ребенок еще маленький. Рустам занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Он хочет вырастить своего ребенка в хороших условиях  и мечтает дать хорошее образование, с этой целью он работает усердно с утра до вечера. В ведении бизнеса помогают члены семьи. Рустам  запрашивает займ для покупки продуктов питания на расширение ассортимента продуктов с целью удовлетворение потребности своих клиентов.
texts.en:
Rustam is a good and hard working family man, who is raising one child. His child is still young. Rustam works with trade of food products. He wants to raise his child in good circumstances and dreams of giving it a good education. With this aim, he works diligently from morning to evening. Members of his family help with running the business. 

Rustam requests a loan for the purchase of food products for the widening of the product assortment, with an aim to meet the needs of his customers.

loans.use: To buy food products to widen the assortment

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: Фарход женат и любящий отец двоих несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Фарход занимается перевозкой пассажиров по городскому маршруту. Он начал данный бизнес 5 лет назад и стал опытным шофером. Ежемесячно получает хорошую прибыль. Данный момент он хочет обновить свой автотранспорт с целью более высококачественного обслуживания. Он хочет продать данный автомобиль, чтобы закупить новую марку автомашины. С этой целью Фарход запрашивает займ в размере 3000 долларов США.
texts.en:
Farhod is married and the loving father of two young children. His wife stays at home. Farhod works with transporting passengers on city routes (marshrutka). He started this business 5 years ago and became an experienced driver. He receives a good monthly income. 

Currently Farhod wants to renew his vehicle, aiming for a higher quality of service. He would like to sell his currently vehicle to buy a new, branded car. With this goal, Farhod requests a loan in the amount of 3000 US dollars.

loans.use: to purchase a new car

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается предпринимательством. Более 8 лет он занимается перевозкой людей. Имеет многолетний опыт в данном бизнесе и хорошо знает специфику своего бизнеса. Также имеет навыки по ремонту автомашин. Хасан хотел бы получить займ для закупа легковой автомашины. ОН надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Hasan is married and raising three children.  His wife is an entrepreneur.  Hasan has been involved in transporting people for over eight years.  He has many years of experience in this business and knows the specifics of this business well.  He is also knowledgeable about car repairs.  Hasan wants to obtain this loan to buy a passenger car.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Khul

texts.en:
Khul is 46 years old and operates a fish selling business from a rented booth in a local market in the Baray District of the Kompong Tom Province. She sells fresh fish caught by her husband. Her husband goes fishing along Tonle Sap River every single day. They support one another in this business in order to raise their children. Two of thier children are married; the remaining one is single and attending school.

Currently Khul would like to borrow her second loan in the amount of 2,000,000 KHR in order to purchase a fishing boat and fishing nets. These items will enable her husband to catch fish efficiently. With the loan's assistance, she hopes that she is able to solve her financial difficulties and secure a good standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing boat and fishing nets.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is 28 years old and lives in the town of Kireka, in the Kampala south region of Uganda. She is married and has four children, three of whom are currently in school. For the past 10 years, Mariam has been working hard to manage her retail shop, where she sells sugar, soap, and salt. 

To help expand her business, Mariam has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more essential commodities for resale, and will help Mariam to generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children. Mariam hopes that in the future she will be able to open another retail shop. 

Mariam is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Mariam who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more essential commodities for resale.

loans.name: Fabio Ceferino

texts.es:
El Señor Fabio Ceferino Tiene mas de 4 Años de laborar para la empresa de acueductos y alcantarillados como fontanero, el se presenta a las oficinas a las 7:30 am para posteriormente salir en cuadrillas a reparar problemas de las tuberías que se presenten en toda la ciudad, terminando sus labores a las 6:00 pm.

Una de las necesidades que se le ha presentado al Señor Ceferino es que no tiene casa propia desde hace mucho tiempo en casa de unos familiares, cansado de esa situación se presento Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con un crédito para construir una pequeña casita y así otorgarle bienestar a su familia y poder contar con su propia casa.
texts.en:
Fabio Ceferino has worked as a plumber for the aqueduct and sewer system company for more than four years. He reports to the office at 7:30 a.m. to subsequently go out with a team to repair any problems that occur in the pipes throughout the city. He finishes work at 6:00 p.m.

An area of need that Ceferino faces is that he doesn't have his own house; he has been living with some relatives for a long time. Tired of that situation, he approached Ceprodel about being granted a loan to construct a little house, which would improve his family's well-being and allow him to have his own home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials like bricks, sand, cement, iron, zinc sheeting, beams, and nails.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Aquilino

texts.es: Aquilino de sesenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol y sorgo tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya  tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia producto de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, Aquilino se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que aprovechar las oportunidades lo llevaran un paso más adelante del éxito; en la última siembra no obtuvo las ganancias esperadas y esta vez quiere aumentar la producción, pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, frijol, loroco, y fertilizante. Aquilino tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Aquilino, age 64, lives with his life partner and their children.  He has been growing corn, beans, and sorghum for many years.  Therefore, he has a lot of experience in the field.  He is very well-known in the area, and he has good clientele.  He gets the best harvests, and he sells first quality products at very accessible prices.  Also, his service is unparalleled.  

Aquilino is known for his great kindness.  He is an enterprising man with a great desire to get ahead.  He thinks that taking advantage of opportunities will take him one step closer to success.  

During the last harvest he did not get the expected income, and this time he wants to increase production.  However, he needs financial support.  That is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  He will use the loan to buy corn, sorghum, bean, and “loroco” (an edible flower native to Central America) seeds and fertilizer.

Aquilino has references for having impeccable morals, for being responsible, and for paying well.  He is confident that he will be able to respond to the debt, and at the same time he will be able to give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn, sorghum, bean, and “loroco” (an edible flower native to Central America) seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Valentina

texts.es: María Valentina de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en condiciones humildes; ella se dedica a la venta de detergentes y otros productos como papel higiénico, pasta dental, cloro, entre otros, ella comercia de forma ambulante en el mercado municipal de la localidad y en las zonas aledañas al lugar, tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas gracias a los años que tiene con su pequeño negocio, los clientes la prefieren porque ella siempre les vende lo que necesitan con producto de primera calidad a precio accesible además el servicio es excelente siempre está a la orden de las personas; María es una mujer decidida y muy visionaria le gusta trabajar duro para lograr sus objetivos, su más grande arma es la confianza en sí misma y el amor que le pone a su labor, ha tenido buenas ventas en estos últimas semanas por eso decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar detergentes, cloro, pasta dental, papel higiénico por mayor, etc. María refleja un buen comportamiento de pago y tiene la seguridad que se hará responsable de saldar la deuda, al mismo tiempo añora poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Valentina, 52, lives with her husband and their children in a modest house.  She has a street-vending business selling detergents, toilet paper, toothpaste, cleaning supplies and other similar products in her town's largest market.  She has operated her little business for many years so she knows what her customers want.  They like her because she sells good-quality products at affordable prices.  She also provides an excellent service and is always available when her customers need her products.  Maria knows what she wants and she recognizes that the way to get what she wants is through hard work.  Her greatest assets are her confidence in herself and the love that she pours into her work.  She's been very successful recently so she's decided to apply to INTEGRAL for a loan that she will use to buy wholesale supplies of detergents, cleaning supplies, toothpaste, toilet paper, etc.  Maria is committed to repaying her loan and confident that she can do it.  She says, too, that she is keen to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies of products for her household goods business.

loans.name: Napoleon

texts.es: Napoleón de sesenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene ya varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa para sus cosechas, todo lo que siembra es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es único, se le da al cliente lo que necesita; Napoleón es trabador, honesto, pero sobre todo luchador, uno de sus más grandes sueños es ver crecer el negocio y esta totalmente dispuesto a  lograrlo, ya ha tenido cosechas no muy favorables  pero eso no lo ha detenido a intentar ser el mejor de la zona, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizantes insecticida y abonos. Napoleón tiene un buen record crediticio y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda;  y con la misma seguridad sabe que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Napoleón is 64 years old, and lives with his life companion and their children in their own home. He makes a living as a corn farmer, and has much experience from his years of harvesting and working. He plants high quality seeds, sells his produce at reasonable prices, and tries to give his customers what they want. 

Napoleón is a hard-working, honest and determined man. One of his dreams is to grow his business, and even though he has had to endure poor harvests, he still works as hard as he can to be the best farmer in the area. With his hope for growth in mind, he is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL which will help him to purchase corn seed, fertilizers, insecticides and manure. Napoleón has a good credit history and is certain that he can repay the loan. With the increased security and stability from the loan, he hopes to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase corn seed, fertilizers, insecticides and manure.

loans.name: Mahmud

texts.ru: Махмуд добрый и трудолюбивый человек, и ответственный отец троих детей. Более 15 лет он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота, а также является водителем автобуса. Он намерен расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Он хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия. С этой целью Махмуд запрашивает займ для покупки цемента, кирпича и камня для строительства своего дома. Махмуд надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Mahmud is a kind and hardworking person and a responsible father of three children.  He has been involved in fattening up and selling cattle for over 15 years, and is also a bus driver.  He intends to expand his business in order to make a good profit.  He wants to improve his living conditions.  For this purpose, Mahmud is requesting this loan to buy cement, bricks and stone for the construction of his house.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks and stone for the construction of his house

loans.name: Kulbara

texts.ru:
Кулбаре 50 лет, замужем, воспитывает 2 детей. Кулбара  в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 2002 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 15,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Кулбары на сегодняшний  день имеется  7 коз, 4 коровы с телятами, что приносит ей около 15,000 сом в месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кулбара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Кулбара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Kulbara is 50 years old, married and has two children.  To provide a primary source of income for her family, she has been involved in animal husbandry since 2002, having started this business with an initial sum of 15,000 som (KGS).  Today, her business contains seven goats, four cows with calves and yields about 15,000 som per month from sales of milk and milk products.  In order to further develop her business, Kulbara requested a loan in the amount of 35,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 48 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala south region of Uganda. She is widowed and has six children, with one of them currently in school. For the past three years, Jane has been working hard to manage her salon, where she does hairdressing. 

To help expand her business, Jane has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more salon items like cosmetics and hair waves, and will help Jane to generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children. Jane hopes that in the future she will be able to expand her business. 

Jane is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Jane who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more salon items like cosmetics and hair waves.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is 30 years old. She and her husband John are blessed with two children ages 5 and 10 years old. She owns a dairy shop where she sells milk, a business she started a year ago. It earns her a monthly income of 15,000 Kenya shillings (KES).

She is requesting a first loan of 20,000 KES to purchase more milk for resale. The profit she earns from it will be invested in her business, as well as repaying her loan. 

Her dream is to open a dairy farm soon.

loans.use: To purchase more milk for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto de sesenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura, cultivo de maíz y maicillo tiene mucho años de dedicarse a este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia siempre obtiene las mejores siembras de la zona; es al mismo tiempo muy buen comerciante las personas prefieren su producto porque es de calidad y lo vende a precios bajos, además que el servicio es excelente; Roberto es un hombre emprendedor muy humilde y responsable, siempre está dispuesto a superarse se caracteriza por ser muy perseverante, piensa que solo se rinde el que no sabe luchar, el emprenderá su batalla y hará expandir su negocio, en las ultimas cosechas debido a problemas de salud se había limitado pero hoy que se siente renovado quiere aumentar la siembra, pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizante y abonos. Roberto es un hombre de paga y está seguro que si le dan la oportunidad del financiamiento podrá cancelarlo con éxito al mismo tiempo llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Roberto is sixty two years old and lives with his partner and children. He has been working in agriculture for many years, cultivating maize and sorghum, and he has a great deal of experience, always obtaining the best harvests in the area. He is also a very good trader: people prefer his products because they are of good quality and he sells them at low prices, as well as providing an excellent service. Roberto is an enterprising man who is very humble and responsible, and who is always ready to better himself. He is very persevering and considers that it is only those who do not know how to fight who surrender. He will fight his battle and expand his business. Due to health problems, he has limited himself in recent harvests but he now feels revitalised and wants to increase his sowing. However, he needs capital which is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow him to buy maize and sorghum seed, fertiliser and compost. Roberto is a man who always pays back his debts and he is sure that if he is given the opportunity of a loan, he will be able to pay it back successfully while bringing economic security to his household.

loans.use: to buy maize and sorghum seed, fertiliser and compost.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en:
Carolina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business of buying and selling rice grains in the Philippines.

Carolina is borrowing 14,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell in her business of buying and selling rice grains. She has been in this business for 3 years. She also earns more income from farming rice.

Carolina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Arcelita

texts.en:
Arcelita is 30 years old and married with three children.

Arcelita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Arcelita has borrowed and paid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the charcoal retail for nine years and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Arcelita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Rosa Miriam

texts.es: Rosa Miriam de cincuenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia los cuales le colaboran con los gastos del hogar, ella se dedica a la venta de productos nutricionales desde su casa y de forma ambulante por todos los alrededores de la localidad, tiene mucha clientela fija pues saben que el producto que comercia es de calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora, responsable y muy honesta, su más grande reto es llegar al éxito y para lograrlo quiere aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presente, ha aumentado la demanda de su producto ya que es un producto novedoso y saludable, por eso quiere aumentar la inversión pero necesita de liquidez por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar productos nutricionales por  mayor para no decepcionar a la clientela; tiene buenas referencias de préstamos anteriores y es de excelente paga, por eso tiene la certeza que cancela a tiempo su financiamiento; además al mismo tiempo quiere regalarle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Rosa Miriam is 58 years old.  She lives in her own home with her children who contribute to the household expenses.  She sells nutritional products from her home and on foot throughout the town’s neighborhoods.  She has many regular customers who know that the products she sells are of good quality and sold at affordable prices.  In addition, she provides excellent customer service.  Rosa is an enterprising, responsible, and honest woman.  Her greatest challenge is to succeed and in order to achieve this goal, she wants to take advantage of every opportunity that presents itself. Demand for her product has grown as it is a new and healthy product.  For this reason, she wishes to increase investment but needs cash.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan from Integral which will enable her to purchase wholesale nutritional products so that she will not have to disappoint her customers.  She has good references from previous loans and an excellent payment record. This is why she is confident that she will pay off the loan on time.  At the same time, she also wants to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale nutritional products.

loans.name: Paulino Alberto

texts.es: Paulino Alberto de  sesenta años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida Ruth y sus hijos  los cuales le ayudan en los gastos del hogar; el posee un negocio de foto estudio y fotocopias desde hace muchos años y tiene mucha experiencia, está ubicado en un lugar estratégico frente al parque de la localidad en una casa de esquina, tiene mucha clientela pues tu trabajo es de calidad y a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente siempre recibe a la clientela con una sonrisa en el rostro; Paulino es un hombre trabajador muy constante en su labor, siempre dispuesto a aprovechar oportunidades, visionario y con ganas de salir adelante, piensa que solo un hombre luchador alcanza la victoria; en este último mes perdió varios clientes debido a que esta defectuosa la fotocopiadora y necesita capital para poder repararla por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar repuestos para fotocopiadora; Paulino Alberto es de moral impecable y muy responsable tiene la seguridad que podrá saldar el saldo de la deuda con las ganancias del negocio y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Paulino Alberto is 60 years old, and lives with life companion, Ruth, and their children, who help out with household expenses. He operates a photocopy and photo studio business, which he started many years ago. He serves many customers, since the business is well located and is in a corner house right next to a local park. He greets customers with a smile, offers excellent service at affordable prices, and he does high quality work. 

Paulino is a very hard-working man who always tries to take advantage of good opportunities. He is a visionary with a desire to get ahead in life, and he believes that only a fighting man will be victorious. This last month he lost several clients since his photocopy machine has been malfunctioning. He needs money to repair the machine, and he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can purchase replacement parts for the photocopier. Paulino Alberto is a man of upstanding morals, and is very responsible with debt and loan payments. He plans to use the support from this loan to grow his business and give his family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase replacement parts for his photocopier.

loans.name: Chuchie

texts.en:
Chuchie is 41 years old and married with nine children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 12,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more stock of items to sell.

Chuchie has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from buying and selling rice. Chuchie aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more stock of items to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Lyn

texts.en:
Ma. Lyn is 34 years old and single.

Ma. Lyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Ma. Lyn has borrowed and paid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from electronic re-loading (sale of electronic credits used for cell phone service or cash transfers).

Ma. Lyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Barbra

texts.en:
Barbra is 29 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala south region of Uganda. She is married and has four children who are all currently in school. For the past six years, Barbra has been working hard to manage her small business, which sells cattle. 

To help expand her business, Barbra has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more cattle for resale, and will help Barbra to generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children. Barbra hopes that in the future she will be able to expand her business. 

Barbra is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Barbra who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more cattle for resale,

loans.name: Fehmida's Group

texts.en:
Fehmida has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will purchase a new sewing machine that will allow her to complete larger orders on time and increase her profits.

She is very skillful and creative in her work. Her clients are very satisfied with the quality of her work and give her regular orders every month. She started her business after the sudden death of her husband a few years ago. This was a great tragedy for her but she never gave up. She started her business, which now earns her a reasonable income every month.

Fehmida is confident that her business will get further established after investing this loan.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok is a 54-year-old woman from the Baray District of Kompong Tom Province. She is a single mother and is responsible for seven children; two of her children work in the construction field in order to help the family. 

Sok cultivates her farmland and harvests various types of crops to sell. She prefers to grow rice, potatoes and beans because these crops have a good market. Sok would like to improve her business, so she decided to request credit from HKL and Kiva. With this credit, Sok will purchase bean seeds, fertilizers and pay for labor costs. She believes that, through her effort, she can have an abundant harvest in the coming season. 

Her business goal is to purchase extra plots of land in order to expand the land area where she cultivates crops.

loans.use: to purchase bean seeds, fertilizers and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Lydiah

texts.en:
Lydiah is 34 years old married and blessed with two children aged 10 and 3 years respectively.  She owns a restaurant, a business she started ten years ago, and earns a monthly income of 30,000 Kenyan shillings (KES).

She is requesting for a first loan of KES 30,000 to purchase more tables and chairs for the hotel. The profit she earns from it will be used to repay her loan and also will be plowed back into her business. 

Her dream is to have a successful business and a healthy family.

loans.use: To purchase additional tables and chairs for the restaurant.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a clothes seller in Nakuru town. She sells jumpers (sweaters) and jackets as well. She is 44 years old and married to Joseph. They have six children.

This will be her first loan from KADET LTD and she plans to use this amount to buy more stock of jumpers to sell. This will enable her to meet the needs of her clients and thereby make more profits.

In the future, Leah hopes to open a boutique and sell all types of clothes and make more income; hence be able to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to add more stock of clothes for sale.

loans.name: Misael De Jesus

texts.es: Misael de Jesús de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, sorgo y frijol, tiene mucha experiencia en el ámbito de la agricultura y los terrenos son muy favorables para su siembra, además tiene mucha clientela pues saben que el comercia producto de calidad, a precio favorable y con un servicio inigualable; Misael es un hombre dedicado a su labor, siempre dispuesto a aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan su más grande secreto es la constancia y el amor al trabajo quiere aumentar su producción es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol y sorgo, además fertilizante y herramienta de trabajo como azadones y cumas para la limpieza en la preparación de la tierra. Misael tiene buenas recomendaciones y es de excelente paga con una moral intachable, está seguro que podrá saldar cada cuota de la deuda y además darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
49-year-old Misael de Jesús lives together with his life partner and children. He works growing corn, sorghum, and beans; he has a lot of experience in agriculture and the land is very favorable for planting. In addition, he has a large clientele since they know that he sells quality products with favorable prices and unparalleled service. 

Misael is a man dedicated to his work, always ready to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves. His biggest secret is his perseverance and his love of work. He wants to increase his production, which is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow him to buy corn, bean, and sorghum seeds, plus fertilizer and tools like hoes and machetes for clearing and preparing the land. 

Misael has good recommendations and is financially reliable with immaculate moral character. He is sure that he will be able to make each payment of the debt and also provide his family with a full life.

loans.use: to purchase corn, bean, and sorghum seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Patric

texts.en:
Patric is 44 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala south region of Uganda. He is married and has two children, both of whom are currently in school. For the past 6 years, Patric has been working hard to manage his workshop business, which sells refrigerators.

To help expand his business, Patric has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more stock, like a fridge, for resale. This will help Patric generate greater profits and increase his income. Patric hopes that in the future he will be able to open a bigger workshop.

Patric is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Patric who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more stock, like a fridge, for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is forty years old and lives in the town of Tororo in the Mbale region of Uganda. She is married and has three children who are all currently in school. For the past twenty years Grace has worked hard to manage her business selling dry foods like maize and beans.

To help expand her business, Grace has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more dry foods like maize to sell and will help Grace to generate greater profits. Her ambition is to expand her business.

Grace is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Grace who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more dry foods like maize to sell.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 29 years old, married to Daniel, and blessed with three children aged 14, 6, and 4 years respectively. She owns a grocery shop, a business she started five years ago, and earns a monthly income of 14,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). 

She is requesting a first loan of KES 30,000 to purchase more maize, beans, fruits, and tomatoes to sell. The profit she earns from it will contribute towards her building her own house. 

Her dream is to have a successful business.

loans.use: To purchase more maize, beans, fruits, and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok is 29 years old; a resident who permanently lives in Ang Snoul district, Kandal province. To generate income, he works for a garment factory in Phnom Penh. His work schedule is from 7 a.m. in the morning until 5 p.m. He earns approximately USD 100 per month by working overtime. In parallel, his wife also works as a garment worker for the same company. This couple has been blessed with two school-age children.

Due to the lack of a vehicle for traveling to work, Sok would like to take out a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase a motorcycle, which provides good transportation services for the family. This loan will help the family reduce their expenses and increase their savings for the future education of their children.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to satisfy the family's living needs.

loans.name: Luy

texts.en:
Luy is a 49-year-old village woman who has had a job as a rice farmer in the Reussey Keo district since she was single. She is able to earn an income of approximately $1.50 a day from her rice crop-planting business. Her husband is a local farmer. The humble couple has six children; two are married while the remaining four are single.

Some profits in the entire family’s main source come from Luy's children, who are employed in variety of occupations, ranging from domestic garment factory workers to construction workers. Recently, Luy’s motorbike broke down during use. For this matter, Luy has decided to seek a loan of $500 US dollars (USD) from Kiva, which she will use to purchase a motorcycle to replace the broken one. She hopes our lenders won’t reject her second cycle loan.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for home use.

loans.name: Santos Abraham

texts.es: Santos Abraham de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a su tía y su hermana; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se siente orgulloso de tener tan grata experiencia ya que le ha ayudado a obtener las mejores cosechas de la zona, comercia solo producto de calidad y a buen precio se ha hecho de mucha clientela y no quiere perderla para eso necesita capital para aumentar la producción y obtener así mejores resultados; Santos es un hombre emprendedor con muchos sueños a  futuro, sabe que el amor a su labor le permitirá llegar al éxito, quiere aumentar su producción para esta siembra pero necesita invertir el doble es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizantes y abonos; Santos es un hombre conocido por su honradez tiene muy buenas referencias de pago, está seguro que con lo que se produzca podrá saldar el financiamiento, además tiene una tienda que lo respalda económicamente que es atendida por su hermana. Tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en: Santos Abraham is 25 years old.  He lives with his aunt and his sister.  He grows corn and has dedicated many years to farming.  He is proud of having so much experience because it has helped him obtain the best harvests in the region.  He sells only good quality products and sells them at a good price.  He has many customers and doesn’t want to lose them, and for this reason he needs capital to increase production and thus, obtain better results.  Santos is an entrepreneur with many dreams for the future.  He knows that devotion to his work will permit him to succeed.  He wants to increase production for this sowing time but needs to invest double.  For this reason, he decided to request a loan from Integral which will permit him to purchase corn, fertilizer, and organic compost. Santos is a man known for his integrity and has good payment references.  He is certain that he will yield a good harvest and be able to pay off the loan.  In addition, he has a store that is his financial back-up.  His sister takes care of the store.  He hopes that, in this way, he will be able to give his family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase corn seed, fertilizer, and organic compost.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos tiene 32 años de edad y habita en  casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de la tierra principalmente de frijoles y maíz, ya que son los granos básicos que se cosechan en la  zona donde habita. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos como un hombre trabajador y responsable. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él, ya que gracias a su generosidad y carisma se ha ganado la confianza de sus vecinos. Es muy importante mencionar que vive en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia.  Esta situación le da más fuerzas para trabajar ya que él es el único que trabaja y recibe un poco de ingresos con la venta de una parte de su cosecha. Considera que es conveniente solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para que le ayuden a cubrir los gastos de la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. Para comenzar la siembra  de los granos básicos y poder continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar, además esta seguro que podrá con las ganancias de su cosecha pagar éste financiamiento
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 32 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children.  He works in farming, mainly beans and corn, as these are the basic grains that are harvested in the area where he lives.  He is very well-known among his neighbors for being a hard-working and responsible man.  Many people give good references regarding him, as thanks to his generosity and charisma he has gained his neighbors' trust.

It is very important to mention that he and his family live in very humble conditions.  This situation gives him more strength to work, as he is the only one working and he earns little income from selling part of his harvest.

He considers it convenient to request this loan from INTEGRAL which will help to cover his expenses in purchasing necessary agricultural supplies such as manure, seeds, fertilizers, etc., With these he can start sowing these basic grains and be able to continue providing sustenance for his household.  He is also sure that he will be able to pay back this loan with the earnings from his harvest.

loans.use: to purchase manure, seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, and beverages

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
This is Lorna, 42, a resident of Malaria within Caloocan City. She is married to Arbi, a mechanic. She has three children, two of whom are in college and one in high school. Together with her husband and children, she manages the household while working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Lorna operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store, or sari-sari, is basically a small convenience store that retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a 5 PHP’s worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Lorna profits by buying supplies at wholesale, then selling them by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house.

Lorna also operates a beauty parlor where customers can have their hair styled or nails done. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Lorna also does direct sales. She earns a minimum of 2000 PHP every day.

To help her continue operations, Lorna is requesting a 37,000 PHP loan from CCT to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her sari-sari’s inventory. She will also use a part of the loan to buy a hair dryer, a foot spa, a hydraulic chair, and other hair treatments. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.

All CCT community members are organized into fellowship groups composed of fifteen to thirty individuals who meet on a weekly basis. There they study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans. Lorna faithfully meets up with her group to share stories of her work every week and draws strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God.

loans.use: To pay for products needed in her business.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah is 25 years old, married to Elkana, and blessed with a nine-year-old child. She owns a boutique, a business she has been doing for the past three years. 

She wants to purchase jeans wear and ladies shoes for sale in her boutique and has requested a first loan of 30,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). The profit from this business will help her invest in other businesses. 

Her dream is to purchase land and build her own home.

loans.use: To purchase jeans wear and ladies shoes.

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es: Jesús ha trabajado toda su vida para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Ella habita junto con sus dos hijas y un hijo.  Gracias al apoyo y educación que ha brindado a sus hijos, ahora los tres son personas de provecho y trabajan duramente par ir paliando la situación económica que cada día es más difícil. En vista a que la situación económica era tan difícil y ella ha sido el sostén del hogar durante mucho tiempo, hace muchos años decidió comenzar con un pequeño bazar en su hogar de habitación, el cual vende variedad de artículos como: palería, juguetes, ropa para bebes, etc. Este ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos que por muchos años le permitió llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Cabe mencionar que aunque ahora sus hijos colaboran con los gastos del hogar, no quiere dejar a un lado su negocio, ya que ella es una mujer trabajadora la cual a pesar de sus 67 años, no se cansa de trabajar y no ha pensado dejar de recibir los ingresos de su bazar. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: variedad de juguetes, ropa para bebes, cuadernos, lápices, lapiceros, pega, papel, etc. Con lo cual sueña darle un impulso a su negocio y continuar recibiendo los beneficios que hasta el momento le han ayudado a sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en: Jesús has worked all her life to be able to take care of her family. She lives with her two daughters and her son. Thanks to the support and upbringing which she has given her children, all three are now hardworking people who work hard to alleviate the economic situation which becomes ever more difficult. In view of the fact that the economic situation was so difficult and that she had been the sole breadwinner for a long time, she decided many years ago to start up a small bazaar in her home, where she sells a variety of items such as stationery, toys, baby clothes, etc. This has been her main source of income which has allowed her to feed her family every day for many years. Despite the fact that her children now contribute to the household expenses she doesn't want to give up her business, as she is a hardworking woman who in spite of her 67 years does not tire of working and who has not considered giving up the income from her bazaar. She is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in buying merchandise such as a variety of toys, baby clothes, notebooks, pencils, pens, glue, paper, etc. With this, she hopes to boost her business and continue making the profits which have helped her to support her family until now.

loans.use: to buy a variety of toys, baby clothes, notebooks, pencils, pens, glue, paper, etc.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Los deseos  de superación,  hicieron que  Reyna Isabel, de 33 años de edad, entrará al mundo de los negocios. Hace 5 años se decidió en comenzar  una pequeña tienda en la sala de su hogar, en la cual vende variedad de artículos como: cereales, golosinas, detergentes, bebidas, etc. además de su tienda también posee una pequeña pupuseria la cual atiende junto con su cuñada la cual forma parte de su grupo familiar junto con sus dos pequeños hijos y un hermano. Desde hace algunos años ha trabajado muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos, ya que es madre soltera y no  cuenta con la ayuda del padre de sus hijos. Es una mujer con mucho coraje, la cual tiene muchos deseos de superación,  su mayor sueño es dar a sus hijos una calidad de vida diferente a la que ella ha tenido acceso, está segura que con la ayuda que ahora   solicita a INTEGRAL para impulsar su negocio, podrá  lograr su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia,  ya que la situación es muy difícil y sabe que la única forma de cambiar su realidad es trabajando muy duro. El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra principalmente de: bebidas y granos básicos, ya que ha notado un aumento en la demanda de estos productos, y como toda una mujer emprendedora no quiere dejar pasar esta oportunidad. Es muy importante mencionar, que está muy agradecida con la ayuda que recibió de esta institución, cuando,  al igual que en esta ocasión necesitó de alguien que le tendiera una  mano.
texts.en: The desire to succeed made 33 year old Reyna Isabel enter the business world. Three years ago she decided to start a little store in the living room of her home, where she sells a variety of goods such as: grains, candies, detergents, drinks, etc. In addition to her store, she has a little pupusa stand which she runs with her sister-in-law who is part of her family group along with her two little children and her brother. For some years, she has worked very hard to raise her family as she is a single mother and does not have the support of her children's father. She is a courageous woman who has a lot of will to succeed. Her greatest dream is to give her children a different quality of life to the one she has experienced. It is certain that, with the help that she is requesting now from Integral to boost her business, she will be able to achieve her dream of improving her quality of life and that of her family, although the situation is very difficult and and she knows that the only way to change her reality is to work very hard. The loan that she is requesting will be used to buy mostly: drinks and staple grains as she has noted an increase in demand for these products. As an enterprising woman, she doesn't want to let this opportunity slip by. It is very important to mention that she is very grateful for the help that she has received from this institution when, as in this case, she needed someone to lend her a hand.

loans.use: To purchase general store merchandise.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en: Kassem is an 18-year-old single Lebanese man living with his parents and five siblings. Four of them are working. His father is the only other source of income in the family and taking on his own all expenses and responsibilities. Kassem owns a poultry shop. He is well known for his generosity and good quality. Today, he’s looking to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase an electrical generator and a freezer.This will allow him to increase his food inventory and keep them in good conditions. In the future, he seeks to open his own snack shop.

loans.use: to purchase an electrical generator and a freezer

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Thirty-six year old Ruth is married to Albert and blessed with three children aged 15, 11, and one year. She owns a boutique--a business that she started three years ago. She earns a monthly income of KES 25,000. 

She has requested her first loan of KES 30,000 to purchase women's suits, shoes, and handbags to sell. The profit earned from her business will help her invest into another line of business. 

Her dream is to become a prominent business lady in town as well as to provide her family with a comfortable life.

loans.use: To purchase more women's suits, shoes, and handbags to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages.

loans.name: Jesse

texts.en:
Jesse is 45 years old and lives in the town of Tororo in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has five children who are all currently in school. For the past 20 years, Jesse has been working hard to manage his butchery, which sells fresh meat.

To help expand his business, Jesse has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more fresh food for the butchery, and will help Jesse to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. Jesse hopes that in the future he will be able to educate his children up to university. 

Jesse is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Jesse who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but whose businesses have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more fresh food for his butchery.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of vegetables to sell and to pay for gasoline for their motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Etbel Jeannette

texts.es: Etbel Jeannethe de 42 años de edad, habita junto con su esposo  de 42 años de edad y sus dos hijos de 18 y 12 años,  el menor se encuentra estudiando.  La señora Etbel se dedica al comercio de de tienda desde hace dieciocho años y medio. Gracias a Dios y a su esfuerzo ha logrado mantenerlo activo y es el que le ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar ya que los ingresos de su esposo no son suficientes para cubrir los gastos de las principales necesidades, las cuales cada vez son mayores. Es muy conocida en la zona ya que siempre ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, para ella lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con su servicio. En cuanto a la estabilidad del negocio, tiene mucha ventaja ya que no cuenta con mayor competencia lo cual la convierte en una de las preferidas de la zona ya que es una de las tiendas mas surtidas en la cual las personas encuentran buen servicio y variedad de productos en muy buenas condiciones.   Últimamente ha estado notando que la demanda de  los productos esta aumentando y muchas veces se queda escasa de producto. Esto la ha llevado a tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de insumos  (frijoles, azúcar, arroz, golosinas, pan, aceite, champo, jabón, papel, etc.) que le permitan cubrir una mayor demanda y de esta manera espera obtener mayores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. cabe mencionar que esta muy agradecida con la ayuda que esta institución le brindo en el pasado.
texts.en: 42 year old Etbel Jeannethe lives with her 42 year old husband and their two children who are 18 and 12 years old. The youngest child is in school. Etbel works in running a grocery store and she has been doing this for 18 and a half years. Thanks to God and her hard work, she has been able to sustain this activity and this is what enables her to put bread on the table every day as her husband's income is not enough to pay for the main necessities, which are always becoming more expensive. She is well known in the area as she always offers quality products and good prices. For her, the most important thing is that her customers are satisfied with her service. Regarding the stability of her business, she has a big advantage as there is no real competition because she has become one of the preferred stores in the area as the store is well supplied and people can get good service there as well as a variety of products in good condition. Lately she has been noting that the demand for her products is increasing and she is often left with a scarcity of goods. This has led her to take the decision to request a loan from Integral to invest in her business by buying supplies (beans, sugar, rice, candy, bread, oil, shampoo, soap, paper, etc.) that will enable her to meet a greater demand and, in this way, she hopes to make better profits that will enable here to improve the quality of life for her and her family. It must be mentioned that she is very grateful for the help that this institution has offered her in the past.

loans.use: to buy: beans, sugar, rice, candy, bread, oil, shampoo, soap, paper, etc.

loans.name: Magret

texts.en:
